Review.Titre: I am trying to rent a car in Brussels…
Review.Contenu: I am trying to rent a car in Brussels airport. I am a Belgian citizen living in Uganda. I am shocked to see that it is significantly more expensive compared to an EU resident. This difference does not exist on other sites (booking.com, Skyscanner, ....). I need an explanation

Review.Titre: Do not give these people your money
Review.Contenu: I booked a 10 day hire through Wisecars (paying in advance) but when I arrived to collect the vehicle I was told I should return in two hours. When I did so, the rental company told me they were still waiting on the vehicle. So I waited in their lobby for another 90 minutes. After waiting 3.5hours in total for them to produce the vehicle they said they could not do so and could not tell me when they would have a vehicle for me. I called Wisecars support and they explained that they would refund me but needed to hear from rental company. I then put the rental company on the phone with the Wisecars support person and the rental company confirmed that they did not have the car available. The rental company representative explained that he could not send that information by email and the Wisecars support person said that the audio recording that Wisecars makes of all its calls was sufficient evidence that the car was not available. I was told that the Wisecars audio recording would be played to the Wisecars manager and that I would receive my refund in 6 working days. After 12 working days I got in touch with Wisecars to ask when the refund would be processed and support got back to me within 30min with this;Thank you for contacting our Customer Support Team.We have reached out to Ace and they sent us this message:Hello Partner,We had a vehicle available for the customer.We have no notes showing the customer arrived to rent.Thank you,If you have evidence that suggests our partner failed to follow our guidelines, please submit it in a response to this message, so we may investigate and act accordingly.Unfortunately, your request for a refund has been denied.I have provided evidence of my arrival at the rental company and departure from the rental company, as well as explained that Wisecars had already told me they had evidence. Wisecars support has been silent ever since. Gonna have to dispute this with the credit card company. This experience ruined my Thanksgiving and continues to create unnecessary stress. Do not make the mistake I made.

Review.Titre: Never rented from Wisecars but they…
Review.Contenu: Never rented from Wisecars but they charged my credit card $718.89 for car rental.  Tried calling and only answer was to press a scam number.  Had to dispute through the credit card company.

Review.Titre: I believe this company is a scam
Review.Contenu: I believe this company is a scam. In my case, they took payment for my rental vehicle, leading me to believe the rental was actually paid for. Upon arriving to pick it up, I was asked to make a deposit along with another payment (even though the money through Wisecars had already been withdrawn). There is no refund if you discover this within 48 hours of your rental pickup. Scam!

Review.Titre: If anything goes wrong you won't get…
Review.Contenu: If anything goes wrong you won't get your money back. They hide behind their Terms and Conditions, they pay their suppliers in advance and can't get their money back from their service providers if anything goes wrong. Stick with renting direct from rental companies.

Review.Titre: Warning don’t use Wisecars or Fox rental
Review.Contenu: Fox shuttle never picked us up and they won’t refund our money.  We arrived at 11:40pm they close at midnight.  We used the phone in the pickup booth and every time they answered and I tried to talk with them, I was disconnected. They had our flight number and access to our arrival time, we waited almost an hour for the shuttle and no one came. We then Had to rush over to Hertz and pay double for a rental car.  They said we were considered a no show and they will not refund our money.  THEY were the no show!

Review.Titre: disappointing experience with refund
Review.Contenu: We had a disappointing experience due to Budget closing their office earlier than advertised, resulting in us not receiving our rental car. The process of obtaining a refund through Wisecar was extremely frustrating. Wisecar seldom provided updates and consistently claimed that they were awaiting a response from Budget. After several weeks of this back-and-forth, and only upon initiating a claim with my credit card company, did Wisecar finally process our refund. Throughout this ordeal, Budget confirmed that they had already issued a refund to Wisecar. This situation has significantly eroded our trust in Wisecar, and we would hesitate to use their services again due to the lack of transparency and responsiveness. Update per 12/18/23: I wanted to add that Wisecar contacted me to apologize for my experience and asked me to remove my review which I find a dubious practice. This review accurately reflects my experience.

Review.Titre: Recent USA trip.
Review.Contenu: Recent USA trip.You use sharp practice when quoting, giving a figure without any insurance, which costs more than the total hire from other “mainstream” suppliers. Even though collision damage wavier was bought as an extra. We were required to provide our our insurance. This requirement is emailed in small print link two days before your trip.Personally will never use your services again.Best avoided.If you really took this issue seriously you wouldn’t wait till two days before a trip to give the information. A number of others collecting cars had the same issue. Taking €500 approx to make a booking is NOT really a sustainable business model guys.I noted in other reviews people who had exactly the same issue!So if you wanted to “fix” your lack of information you have certainly had the time.I intend to bring this issue to light when I get home.Your lack of transparency is - well I can’t really express my rage, and your sincerity is shown by your lack of action.

Review.Titre: DO NOT USE THEM
Review.Contenu: Customer service at the airport was lacking on all levels. There was no proper explanation on upcharges and other details and when asked about it, the representative didn't have the answers. Online says one thing and in-person is another.

Review.Titre: I don't believe the reviews on this…
Review.Contenu: I don't believe the reviews on this site. On other sites the 1 star reviews are more than half of all listed. I too have been scammed by Wisecars. They cancelled my reservation when arriving due to the car was no longer available, however they had a different car for almost double the cost, no thank you! 6 weeks later and still no refund even after two phone calls being told the refund was sent and it's my bank holding the funds. My next step is to contact my state Attorney Generals office to file a complaint for violating fair trade laws. Also thinking of starting a class action lawsuit, Wisecars is making a fortune holding funds and not delivering.

Review.Titre: They kept all of my deposit after…
Review.Contenu: They kept all of my deposit after booking a car with them , Hertz did not accept my booking with a debit card....So I got online and booked a LUXURY CAR with TURO no hassle debit card and all.

Review.Titre: Without doubt the worst customer…
Review.Contenu: Without doubt the worst customer experience possible. I booked a hire car with these guys for a holiday. A completely different class of vehicle was provided on the day than I’d paid for which meant I had to pay the actual provider again for the car I needed.I then tried to get a refund from wisecars for the original booking which was refused. I tried to do a chargeback with my credit card provider and wisecars lied to them to avoid the chargeback.The only way I got my money back after nearly six months of complaining was to commence legal proceedings. Avoid at all costs

Review.Titre: I made a reservation and printed out a…
Review.Contenu: I made a reservation and printed out a confirmation and the next then they cancelled on their end not sure why?  Anyways not confident to book through them again.

Review.Titre: DO NOT rent from this company!
Review.Contenu: UPDATED: The company has yet to contact me, even though I provided the reservation # per their request. It has been 4 days. UPDATED:I have attached a copy of the confirmation email containing my reservation number. DO NOT rent from this company!! They cheated me out of a rental fee by saying I was a no show because I did not have a credit card. I've never had trouble renting from a company with a debit card before, even internationally, and don't even own a credit card. Never mind that I had already paid the majority of the rental fee and only owed a small amount or that the no debit card policy was not included in the confirmation email. Or the fact that their policy is buried in the terms and conditions and not obvious on their website. They do NOT care. I will NEVER rent from them again.

Review.Titre: DON'T FALL FOR THE FAKE REVIEWS
Review.Contenu: DON'T FALL FOR THE FAKE REVIEWS this company is a nightmare. You think you're getting a good deal but they are just a booking agent and when you get to collect your car you will find that the rental fee includes virtually none of the insurances you need and if your flight is delayed, don't expect your car to still be waiting for you. If you haven't paid for the cancellation insurance, they will keep all your rental and you will end up paying twice. When you add in all the extras, it's cheaper to rent from an established supplier.

Review.Titre: Rent-A-Car Nightmare:Missing Refund
Review.Contenu: We rented a car via wisecar which is not wise at all 😂the car agent in Sofia didn’t give us the car because he tried to debit the deposit from the CC,enough balance was available,the agent said it’s a technical error and we can’t give you the car,you will get your money back to your card,they ordered a taxi for us and we left,it’s been 45 days and we didn’t get our money and wisecar is not answering my emailsMy advice is to deal with a company who respects the customerThey have taken hours from my time and energy to solve the problem and it’s not solved yet.

Review.Titre: Avoid this company - Scam Artists
Review.Contenu: Avoid this company - they scam you. I paid for a booking and also excess protection. When I arrived to pick up the car today, I was told there was no insurance with the car. I spoke to rude and arrogant Wisecars representative who said that I would have been told there was no insurance. He then checked and actually that statement was not included in the terms and conditions. I had to buy very expensive insurance at the counter - which cost more than double the booking of the car. Absolutely atrocious service. Avoid avoid avoid.RESPONSE TO RACHELI have already raised an internal ticket with your ‘Support’ team. They have sent vague responses not accepting responsibility for your actions. I have also flagged that Wisecars practices are unlawful under U.K. consumer protection regulations - and sent the government guidelines that demonstrate you are in breach. These points have been ignored by Wisecars by your representative Eduardo Torres. In the absence of a resolution set out in my complaint email, I will pursue this matter through legal channels.

Review.Titre: Total con artists avoid at all cost pick up our car on 12th…
Review.Contenu: We arrived to pick up our car on 12th August, however on arrival they refused all our credit cards, cooperate business cards and also my daughters credit cards, however they maracalously managed to find an exact same vehicle from another provider, double the price of our original booking, they then assured us our original booking would be refunded... Total lies, on returning the car 26th August I popped into these crooks to confirm my refund, I was told I would receive it in 7 to 10 days there would be no problem More lies... Its now nearly 2 months and they are refusing to pay the original payment back, I have been left with a bill of over £2,000 for a &600.00 hire car. These people are total con artists do not touch with a 30 foot barge pole my advice double check any paperwork with these fraudsters and keep well, well, well away

Review.Titre: Dishonest Theives
Review.Contenu: This company is dishonest and doesn't attempt to help resolve their problems.  I never got an email with details that would "open".  I only got a confirmation of my date and address for pick up.  I was there hours b4 my deadline but could only pay the balance w cash, debit or credit card not in the driver's name (which is what i pd the downpayment with).  They refused to take that, refused to change the name on the reservation, and said I'd be flagged as no show, leaving me stranded in a state 3000 miles from home. DO NOT deal with them.  Maybe my disastrous experience will help you avoid this situation.  Horrible people who refused to help me...they got my  $250 and I got stranded.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: This company scammed me. It happened over a year ago, but I keep emailing them. My last was 9th November, Josef got back to say he would look into it. 2 weeks later no reply. This company are a disgrace

Review.Titre: Bad service and scamming
Review.Contenu: When we arrived at the rental place, we couldnt get our car, which were prepaied. The Company then referer us to a business partner, where we could get the exact same car, we just had to pay 1.000 dollar more. Afterwards, we contacted the customer service to get the first booking cancelled. After 2 weeks waitingtime, we could get 75% of the Money we paied ahead back, cause they needed the last 25% in customerservice fee. Wouldnt recommend this. Bad service and bad experience.

Review.Titre: Secret rental agency scam
Review.Contenu: Secret rental agencies is really unacceptable. You don't know who you are renting from and the companies vary in quality massively. You don't book a flight without knowing the airline, or a hotel without knowing the name of it. It's a poor business practice and undermines consumer confidence.

Review.Titre: Not at all happy given huge charges at pickup on top of what I had already paid
Review.Contenu: I booked a car with what I thought was insurance cover (excess cover included). We arrived at Fox (the car provider) to be told you have no insurance and that to get it will be more than the cost that I have already paid wisecars. So as not to ruin the holiday at the start I felt pressured into paying for that - wisecars support reponse was "you signed for it so it's your problem". The wisecars documents and website need to be a whole lot clearer about what you are and are not getting as part of their deals so that you are properly informed. I'll not be using them again as the total cost ended up being more than the big name companies I had decided againstPer the wisecars feedback I have already dealt with your support people to no avail. Take a look at support request #363726 if you want and if so reply outside of this system with any details that you still need

Review.Titre: Absolutely appalling!
Review.Contenu: Absolutely appalling! Rented a car through WISECARS only to find out that it had been cancelled when I went to pick it up. Was sent a voucher confirmation indicating that it was all confirmed a couple of days before and at pick up was told they didn't have enough cars available. It ruined our holiday and ended up having to pay much more, even if I booked the car several months ago. Just in the process of making a complaint and hoping that they at least respond quickly and efficiently.Update: As requested by Wisecars I have now sent them details about our booking and I will update you all about how they resolve this matter.

Review.Titre: Avoid these rip off merchants
Review.Contenu: Avoid these rip off merchants. Refused my valid credit card, but then surprisingly the guy on the counter offered another company that his friend owned. Same credit card was perfectly good for those, and to note the guy on the refusal side then told I only had a debit card which is a total lie just so they get to steal my original 600 deposit. Explained all this to their customer service department who just state I only had a debit card, die to the report from the guy on the counter. This company is a farce and seems they will use any opportunity to scam you.

Review.Titre: Very poor company
Review.Contenu: Booked with this company some time ago as it seemed a reasonable price. Didn't know the company I was getting the car from until 48hrs before I arrived. That company was the worst company I have ever rented a car from. What made it worse was Wisecars are the first company I have used that DID NOT include any insurance. I was shocked when I had to pay over $1300 to the local car hire firm. With Wisecars rental fee I would have got it cheaper booking direct with Alamo (or similar) on site at MCO.

Review.Titre: Disappointment
Review.Contenu: When we arrived at the airport and went to pick up the car, Fox charged not only the balance we'd have to pay, but what we have paid in advance at the moment of the reservation at Wisecars.So, instead of paying 650,99 usd, we payed 1291,56 usd for the car. Even showing the reservation number and papers, the attendant said we could only have the car if all amount was paid. She ignored everything we said.

Review.Titre: Double charged
Review.Contenu: Great initial service and car was available as promised with Avis.We had pre paid in advance with our credit card and needed no insurance or anything as it was provided on the credit card.After the trip, Avis slammed through and additional $1000+ charge on our card. Wisecars have taken weeks to deal with this and now claim it was for Insurance. We never knowingly purchased Insurance as we didn’t need it. Be very very careful when dealing with this company. Better to deal direct and know what you are getting.

Review.Titre: Beware of extra charges
Review.Contenu: Beware! Booking from the UK was quick and simple with competitive rates. I was quoted and paid just over £400 for 2 weeks car hire in the States. However on arrival I had to pay more again, which I'd have accepted to some extent. Now I've arrived home I found I've actually been charged nearly 4 times the original amount, £1500 in total!!! These costs are not transparent and effectively out of your control once they have your card details. I'll not use them again.

Review.Titre: VERY BAD SERVICE
Review.Contenu: VERY BAD SERVICE. I paid for my booking two months in advance. I regularly received the voucher two days before the rental but at the check-in THERE WAS NO RESERVATION. There were no other cars available. I had to spend 700USD extra to rent another car. Wisecar only cancelled my booking and refund the amount I paid in advance but they did not want to refund me for the extra charge I had to pay. DON'T USE WISECAR. IT DOES NOT WORK. STAY AWAY FROM IT!

Review.Titre: Beware of scamming providers
Review.Contenu: I rented a car in Malta on Wisecars.com during my holiday this summer. The car rental provider turns out to be a scammer and charged my deposit for no reason. I contacted Wisecars for help, but they didn't really do any help (always say they are still contacting and later simply closed the tickets). Conclusion: if car providers on Wisecars.com turn out to be scammers (and they can), Wisecars.com won't do much to compensate for your loss.

Review.Titre: Totally worthless
Review.Contenu: Totally worthless! In their system i live in the US (never filled this in, i live in the netherlands) and because of this upon arrival my excess was 19200 euros!!! I had to pay an extra 266 euros to get this down (which almost doubled the rental price) And all they say is you didn't read the little letters in our contract.  Better avoid wisecar!Edit august 28th 2023Pretty words from Rachel but no response nor a solution yet! Their customer service is more concerned with reviews than solutions.

Review.Titre: BEWARE of THRIFTY it's a scam on fuel charges
Review.Contenu: Wisecars was fine on our rental BUT our Rental was through Thrifty and I will never do that again.  When we got back to the Maui Airport(OGG) we had filled up the car 5 minutes earlier.  It was approx. a 1/2 mi away.  When I got out of the car the gal had written something on the side window.  I asked what that was and she replied it was regarding something with safety.  Maybe it did or did not I don't know, but ours had some letter then -X.  I noticed another car but it just had the x.  I asked about the bill and she said that we owed $12.05.  I asked what that was about and she said that she didn't know and that we would have to go to the front desk.  I thought that was odd and did not have time to stand in line so I waited for the email. When I got it IT SAID FUEL CHARGE!!!  When you call Thrifty and finally get through they actually have in their queue to push a number if you had a fuel charge that you don't think you should.  When you push that they tell you that you have to send them the receipt to PROVE time and where you filled up.  Mind you we were charged before they EVER EVEN TOUCHED the car.  When I called I told them it seemed like standard practice to charge people.  They did finally refund our money on that.  We also had to replace the battery in the remote so that we did not get stranded.  We called Thrifty and they said that if we would replace it rather than having them drive and hour to meet us that they would refund us.  They did not.  The car was also not clean and the roof fabric looked like someone had exploded a pop by it.  I will never rent through Thrifty again.

Review.Titre: Beware
Review.Contenu: Beware!   After paying for the rental in full on online as well as being told when I returned the car all fees were paid in full.   Two weeks after returning from my trip I am getting a invoice from Fox saying that I owe a additional 98.00 for administrative fees.    Will Never rent another car thru them again and neither should anyone else!

Review.Titre: Jack the lad company, schemers
Review.Contenu: Have hired from a proper company. Avoid these chances. No hidden charges. This company hired cars hiding behind small print be careful. Use another company Re:Ticket no:TL1670574305-55993443 ref no, Orlando. This is the number, you already knew. Your gonna give same old bull about cheaper rates. You hid info within small print to con people into thinking insurance was paid. It clearly stated" NOTHING moe to pay" enough said. Pay me my money. You and Zezgo are collaborating

Review.Titre: Avoid ,wise cars and Fox rentals Florida.
Review.Contenu: 10th May 2023 rented prior to trip took insurance plus extra cover plus cancellation insurance received an email saying everything paid nothing more to pay,but all changed when arriving at fox rentals , Agent refused to acknowledge we had insurance or unlimited mileage cover and charged us for both 189.72 and 142.20 respectively ripped off ref no.11855507.Thank you for the reply news to me that their was no insurance purchased at time of  purchase,plus will I be receiving a fund for the mileage that was charged against me.Awaiting your reply re 11855507

Review.Titre: Wise up and avoid wise cars
Review.Contenu: Wise up and avoid wise cars. Booked a car in Ontario, Ca, never received a voucher but they took my money. Stranded after midnight to a closed car rental center. None of the car rental brands had a reservation for me. Massive fail. Book direct and save true heartache snd the 300 bucks I had to spend to drive to Palm Springs.

Review.Titre: completly misinformed
Review.Contenu: Whe were offerd a insurence but when we arrivd at the rental counter it turned out that this was not the right insurence and we had to book the car al over again. Ofcourse the price was completly different the.After a long talk, and telling them that we wanted te cancel the car, the propertymanger was willing to help us out

Review.Titre: I made a reservation through Wise Cars…
Review.Contenu: I made a reservation through Wise Cars but ended up canceling because my mom passed and I had to change my travel plans (note: the cancelation policy was free as long as I notified the company in advance, which I did - giving several weeks' notice). They acknowledged receipt of the change. Nonetheless, I was charged $200 because the car vendor said I was a "no show." I even provided email evidence that I had cancelled in advance, yet the company didn't give me a refund. Don't ever use Wise Cars, they are terrible and make you pay for your mistake, instead of taking responsibility for their mistakes. Wise Cars, if you continue to treat your customers this way, you will go out of business. It's not smart to be unfair to people.

Review.Titre: Do not use
Review.Contenu: Warning. Do not use. Would give no stars if possible. Booked car in Florida. Upon collection, told that could not drive outside Florida. Details hidden in small print on page 8 of t & c. Wisecars response was that the geographical restriction is shown on the voucher. It is NOT.

Review.Titre: Be the smart one and don`t hire a car…
Review.Contenu: Be the smart one and don`t hire a car via wisecar as they are only a 3rd party and all they want is your money and not supplying what you want .no cdwall fees are extra ie break down cover road assistance fuelinsurance the list goes on ,so do the smart thing and go direct to hire companies its a lot cheaper

Review.Titre: NOT A SERIOUS COMPANY
Review.Contenu: NOT A SERIOUS COMPANY. Paid for a month long rental to this Polish car rental app, WiseCars, and when we arrived to THRIFTY they not only didn't honor their voucher, they wanted us to pay 2x above what we already paid. Wisecars is not replying to our REFUND requests. Felicity Travaini

Review.Titre: Took my money but no vehicle
Review.Contenu: **see update**  Rented a vehicle at the wrong location...took a lyft to the right location and when we arrived, the rental had been 'cancelled"  Not even sure if we had a legit rental in the first place despite the e-mail from wisecars as Avis had zero confirmation whatsoever.  Had to pay top dollar for a vehicle 'right now'.  Called Wisecars FOUR times, was assured they would look into into the charge they placed on my credit card and get back to me.  NEVER returned my calls, never issued refund.  Had to dispute with my credit card company.  DO NOT TRUST THESE SCAMMERS**UPDATE**  Wisecars now wants more info. Really...???  I called when I was at the Santa Barbara airport after Avis informed me my reservation was cancelled.  On hold for ages, finally spoke to someone who was clueless and could not help me.  I ended up renting a car for a very high 'right now' price.  Called Wisecars on 11.13 spoke to Hazel who said they would get back to me in 3 business days.  They did not.  Called again on 11.15 and spoke to Lines who said they would get back to me in 24-48 hours.  They did not.  Called again on 11.18, on hold 45 minutes although I was 'next in line" then got disconnected.  ENOUGH.   Booking #37137978Bottom Line, I have done due diligence to resolve this with Wisecars but no one can help me, no one has answers, and no one gets back to me.  I am done with this review, I am done with Wisecars as I am now the wiser.  Disputing the charge thru my credit card company. Did you get enough info Wisecars???

Review.Titre: Wisecars left me stranded - HORRIBLE SERVICE
Review.Contenu: I arrived at the rental agency only to find out that I had booked the start date of my reservation a day early by mistake.  I admit this was my mistake.  I called Wisecars customer service, and was told because I didn't show up for my reservation the day before, the reservation was canceled and I forfeited payment for the entire week.  I asked since I had only missed a day, could I forfeit the day, and still have the remaining amount I pre-paid applied to the rest of the week.  I was told by Wisecars they would not apply any portion of the amount paid to a new reservation.  Wisecars just kept my money, and would not agree to release it to the rental agency they were brokering, even when that rental agency was willing to help.  Brutal lesson learned, and awful customer service.  I was distressed and stranded, and the service agent could not have cared less.  I will never use Wisecars again.

Review.Titre: 2x Price increase AFTER finalized deal
Review.Contenu: Concerning #97485518Twice increasing the price AFTER the deal was finalized. After second acceptance of price increase with frustrations and complain, we have not received a single word from Wisecars and been completely ignored. You might think you have a deal - but the supplier are able to increase the price continuously without renter protection.You might wanna think twice before you book a car with Wisecars

Review.Titre: car good, service terrible after
Review.Contenu: they provided the car service, but refuse to send an invoice as requested. the whatsapp not work, imessages cut me off, email they keep sending receipt not vat/ iva/ tax breakdown invoice. my insurance company and the law courts require a company invoice since the car was hired following a car accident.their reply here says they will, the same customer's service email already refused help, now they say they don't pay vat/ iva/ tax? which country are they based in? cannot be as they say usa or uk and trading in eu all of which charge tax

Review.Titre: Fishy site
Review.Contenu: It was not possible to set the time of pick up or drop off. Cancellation was advertised as 24 hours before pick up but is in fact 48 hours. There is no link for the cancellation.

Review.Titre: BEWARE of this company
Review.Contenu: BEWARE of this company. I rented a car for two weeks and they took half the cost up front. I got to the rental car company and they would not take my debit card though I had checked through every means available. The rental card company wrote on my contract that I should be given a refund. However Wisecars would not give the half of the two week rental back! Very sketchy company! Go through a more reputable rental car booking company which I did and had no issues as everything about the debit card was upfront.

Review.Titre: Stealing money
Review.Contenu: They let me book the car in advance with my debit-creditcard, unfortunately. When we got to the desk on July 10th, this card was not accepted and we couldm' get our car. We asked if we could use my girlfriends credit card instead but he couldn't change the cards inside the system. Desk officer told us reservation will be cancelled, the money will be paid back and we can try our chance at a different rental. He assured us that we will have our money back in a few days. But it turned out this was a cancellation WITHOUT MONEY REFUND. Even after writing to the agency, no help, no refund, no voucher or anything. Terrible mean trick to steal money of your customer. Terrible customer service.

Review.Titre: Avoid. Cheap for a reason.
Review.Contenu: Avoid.1.  The only company I’ve come across so far that books car without Collision  Damage Waiver (CDW). I understand that is the reason it was so much cheaper.2. They understanding of ‘similar’ car rather wide… Booked Citroën C4(or similar) and got Mini - quite different sized cars which is rather obvious. Had difficulty fitting my family and all the luggage in it.And as I expected, the support is rather  not very supportive. Trying to shift the blame to the supplier and not admitting anything…Will not use them again

Review.Titre: AVOID! Cancelled my booking on the day without warning.
Review.Contenu: I booked my car rental for a trip to Crete through wise cars. I even received the confirmation and instructions on which rental shop to visit when I arrived in Crete. When I left the airport I called wise cars for directions to the rental shop, provided my booking confirmation and was given directions. Upon talking to the rental shop they had no booking. I called Wisecars again only to be told my booking had now been cancel and refunded, leaving me stranded in Crete forced to pay a higher rental price on the day.

Review.Titre: I rented a car with WiseCars for my…
Review.Contenu: I rented a car with WiseCars for my father & brother. I decided to rent online to make it easier when they got to the airport. After the trip was over, my brother gets a bill from Thrifty’s Rent A Car for $700….  Paying WiseCar already I thought we were good to go… BUT NO…. If anyone can help I would be grateful… We didn't ask for extras... I just wanted to rent a reasonable car for my dad & brother in Seattle. I'm very disappointed that I couldn't rent a car online, without getting ripped off. Why would I get another driver-my dad wasn't going to drive-my brother was the sole driver.. If I rented with you, I should have had everything taken care of-get off the plane-get the car and go.... I assumed renting with you ONLINE would save me and be hassle free. Not happy at ALL... You need to be more upfront , let people know it's not $386.52 it is about 1,300 to rent a crappy car... So NO I DIDN'T ASK FOR EXTRAS- "I " MY FATHER DOESN'T HAVE EXTRA...  jody (daughter)

Review.Titre: THEY CLAIM ONE PRICE TO GET YOU THERE…
Review.Contenu: THEY CLAIM ONE PRICE TO GET YOU THERE THEN THEY WANT TO PUT RESTTICTIONS ON YOU  BECAUSE YOU ARE LOCAL WANTING TO CHARGE ANOTHER $175  FOR A WEEKS RENTAL THEY HAVE LAME CUSTOMER SERVICE ASKED TO SPEAK WITH A MANAGER AND WAS TOLD WE WOULD HAVE TO WAIT 20MINS. AFTER BEING THERE A HOUR. WAS TOLD WE WOULD HAVE TO CALL THERE CUSTOMER SERVICE LINE. VERY SHADY WAY TO DO BUSINESS

Review.Titre: Misled. Prices not cheap as they look.
Review.Contenu: As soon as I made my way to the counter the rental company rep asked me if I am really sure about having an excess of €30,000 in case of an accident. I was astonished to discover that I was sold a car rental through this website that has zero insurance which I thought could not happen as it is outright illegal. Apparently it isn't. Bottom line is that I was misled and the cheap prices quoted on this website do not feature the real costs. I had to pay an additional €210 euros for insurance at the counter on top of the €300 or so I paid for the car through this website.

Review.Titre: Not great with dealing with family fueds.
Review.Contenu: My ex-wife took my credit card and booked a rental car in an act to spoil my honeymoon with my new wife (booking a mini van instead of the sports car I booked with Sixt directly to spite me for not wanting to have children with her).  Liisbet was understanding, but was not able to help refund the $425 rental because it was 30 hrs away from the start.  In the future, I hope any of my ex-wives use a different service to spoil my plans.  I am now having to cancel my credit card to avoid getting charged.  What a miserable honeymoon.In response to Rachel's diplomatic response below: My ex wife used my email address, my credit card (now cancelled), and my name.  She knew all of these things...because we were married.Not sure how a company can be so heartless in such a difficult and personally trying time.

Review.Titre: *Avoid this company*
Review.Contenu: Had booked and paid a hire car for collection in Bergamo Italy through Wisecar. When we arrived to pick the car up from SurPrice, my husband's credit card had less than 3 months expiry so they wouldn't accept it. He then produced another credit card only to be told he would have to pay additional insurance as the card only had the initial of his forename followed by his surname and they couldn't guarantee it was his card!!!!!!!!! So we were left with no option but to take the non refundable insurance of €300. We were not the only ones that day to be scammed.... and then when leaving the car back there were at least 3 other people who were having similar issues. AVOID THIS COMPANY...THIEVES...SCAMMERS....We phoned Wisecar who we had booked it through only to be told there was nothing they could do!!!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Company changed my reservations several…
Review.Contenu: Company changed my reservations several times without permission. When I called, no answer. When I talked to them on chat, they quite literally tried to get me to buy their friends used car….? I don’t know what’s going on over there but it is not legit.Edit:Thanks for the response. I would highly consider not using Facebook messenger to handle customer service chats. Tbh that’s pretty unheard of in this day and age.Editing again to state that the company is trying to have my review removed.

Review.Titre: Redirected among three vendors = terrible
Review.Contenu: Redirected among three vendors: Dollar -> Thirifty -> Hertz. Had to wait an hour for a car despite reservation. Clerk supposedly called for us without a PA system = extremely inefficient.Had to change cars unexpectedly due to some computer glitch = Absolutely moronic.

Review.Titre: Wisecars Boston
Review.Contenu: When picking up the car, Dollar informed me that Wisecars had not included taxes in their quote (despite me presenting the voucher saying that I had paid in full). Dollar charged me for all taxes (about 40% over what had already been paid) and Wisecars have not been able to resolve the issue in the past three weeks. When I do receive a response (usually only when you call; emails don’t seem to get a response), it’s always that it will take just a little longer than the previous rep had promised.

Review.Titre: Worst Car Rental Company in the World - Stay Away
Review.Contenu: Wisecars falsely advertised vehicles for rental on their website. They also work with sub-par rental companies that will not guarantee the vehicle even if you pre-pay it in full. We landed at Denver Airport and the rental company refused to give us any car even though they had plenty of vehicles for customers that did not book through Wisecar. After making a scene, they finally gave us the cheapest and worst maintained car they had and refused to reimburse the difference

Review.Titre: I never received my rental car
Review.Contenu: I never received my rental car. I changed my dates and was sent an email saying the charge was more. I asked to cancel but was out of my 48 hr window. I decided to take the offer and never received a reply to my email until Monday. I needed my rental on Saturday.

Review.Titre: A Wise move is to avoid this company
Review.Contenu: I was assured that there was nothing to pay when I collected the car if I paid the excess insurance fee before travel. I had to pay $39.99 per day or I was not allowed to use the car as this was legal requirement. The car was not in good condition and smaller than I paid for. Wisecar were not interested and said it was my fault as I should have read small print.

Review.Titre: Wisecars stole 1000 dollars from me and…
Review.Contenu: Wisecars stole 1000 dollars from me and my partner. We have had both email and verbal confirmation from wisecars that we would receive a refund for returning a vehicle early. Everytime we have called to speak to someone, they have told us someone will contact us within 10 days, and no one ever does, so I call again. Its a cycle I think they do on purpose, as they overcharged us in the first place. Under no circumstances should you ever use this company they will hide absorbent hidden fees and then trap you by not giving you the refund they themselves promised you. I will be reporting this to the better business bureau because its just straight up theft. And if anyone wants proof I got receipts. This company is just plain wrong.

Review.Titre: Dodgy
Review.Contenu: They have responded with same rubbish. Yes it's there in the small print. No idea it was a basic package it does not state that. It stated, nothing more to pay. I must be ok driving with no insurancethen. Total lies and fabrication. Do not use them Still no satisfaction. They know they are wrong and yet they cannot be honourable and refund me the cash they stole through underlying tactics

Review.Titre: I will never rent from this company again.
Review.Contenu: The company held my money when I was not able to rent their vehicle from Fox.  I went back and forth with them, prividing information to substantiate my request for reimbursement and they were rude, disrespectful, and non compromising.

Review.Titre: Rating False. They are underhand
Review.Contenu: No way has this company got 4.5stars. they are untrustworthy. Use small print to hide from truth. My invoice said"NOTHING more to pay" but they state somewhere is says I'm not insured. Surely it's illegal in USA to drive with no insurance. That should not even be separate. Even a basic insurance. There rating is probably false and it never mentioned a basic passage. It said and I'll recap ,"NOTHING more to pay "

Review.Titre: This is an update for my previous 5…
Review.Contenu: This is an update for my previous 5 stars review. The company is a fraud.We drive in Malpnsa airport (Italy). When we get to the rental place we didn't get reserved car because we did not have international driver license. All we provide is US Driver License and US Pasport and credit card ( as per info received from the wisecar representative)  I contacted them over the phone and their representative can not explain anything. We went back to airport and in 10 minutes get the car from reputable car rental Avis company. I received couple of emails from wisecar rep (Elsa and Siin) who tried to cause me that I was informed of the situation with international driver license which is pure lie. I contacted my credit card company who imideatly sroprd the payment. My recommendation BE AWARE TO DEAL WITH THIS COMPANY.

Review.Titre: Awful company to do businesses with, a bunch of thieves
Review.Contenu: I placed a reservation through wisecars and when I showed up at the car rental I was denied the service as I was driving the car out of the state, car rental didnt charge and mentioned that wisecars would issue a refund as the service was not provided, wisecars responded to me I falled in a no-show condition (I showed up with a valid driver license and valid credit card, the car rental just didn't want to rent me the car), many attempts to settle the situation with wisecars ended on them just denying the refund, charge disputed with my bank and complaint with BBB filled. Awful company to do businesses with

Review.Titre: Be very careful of the Fineprint in their contract..
Review.Contenu: I am extremely disappointed by wisecars.  Anyone using them needs to be extremely careful as some of the car companies they use only accept credit cards and not debit cards.  It does not matter how much you have on your debit card - you will not be able to rent a vehicle and Wisecar will keep all your money even when the car company agrees that they will cancel the booking.  This happened to me in December 2022.  It is then impossible to get a response from them which is personalised.    It is pretty much theft as they do not need to pay the car rental company and they keep your money.  Please be very very carefulI have since been contacted by Wisecar and to be fair to them they did provide a partial refund.  This took a month but they have in my view been reasonable.

Review.Titre: Very unprofessional company
Review.Contenu: Very unprofessional company! Do not use them for your rental needs. They will not issue me a refund when I was unable to pickup the car, the marked me as a “no show” when we were there for pickup. I was hung up on while at the rental for place. Fraud

Review.Titre: Dreadful Experience
Review.Contenu: Hi Rachael,Re Booking Ref 41633861You kindly advised me last week that my refund was being pursued by Wisecars management. As you are aware this has been ongoing from the 23rd June and I still have not received my refund of £474.38 stg. Can you please tell me when I will receive my refund. Thank you.Chris Bennett

Review.Titre: Shocking customer care after service once they have your money
Review.Contenu: After having had our initial flight aborted due to a cracked windscreen   we notified Wisecars we would be late but wanted to retain the car as has had pre-paid in full. Receipt of our emails were acknowledged but after almost 2 days of flying due to re-arranged flights we arrived at Orlando at 8 pm to be told there was no vehicle available. With 3 children ,over 3 hours later we still had no car and had tried to contact wisecars and been cut off , with no call back and then their lines were uncontactable for the rest of the evening. We had no option but to pay more for a separate hire as we’re exhausted at this time . Customer services were most unhelpful the next day and we found out we did not actually have the comprehensive cover their website leads you to believe . So please check your documents carefully. My full complaint will be submitted on return to the UK as I will not waste another minute of my holiday on this company.(In response my Reservation ref with Wise Cars :83636250)

Review.Titre: I am having a horrendous experience…
Review.Contenu: I am having a horrendous experience with Wisecars. I booked and paid in full for my rental. I arrived at the desk to collect my rental to be told that my rental had been cancelled. I then had to pay in full for a new rental. It has cost me substantially more and I am disgusted and disappointed with the fact I can’t get a response from Wisecars

Review.Titre: There's better options
Review.Contenu: I would like to share my unfortunate experience with this farce of a service. I am autistic and not very good at these kinds of things but needed a way to get around while I visited my daughter in Phoenix. I was drawn in by the too-good-to-be-true pricing and happily paid for a reservation with Fox rent a car through the wisecars site. I intended to use a visa debit with line of credit at pickup since it said credit only and those are typically accepted as such.Fox was awful…I tried to call them 3 times before they closed as my flight was arriving near the time they shut down at 12:30am. They never bothered to answer and nobody was at the desk when I arrived just moments late. I patiently waited until they were to open at 4am and nobody showed up. About 15 minutes later I called wisecars who were unable to help or contact anyone from Fox including the location manager. Eventually at 4:25 I finally found an agent wandering the parking garage and attempted to retrieve my reservation. The agent was impatient and rudely threw the debit card back at me without even asking if it had line of credit and unkindly told me they were unable to help. I was now stuck in Phoenix with no way around and a large part of my funds tied up. All in I was up for 40 hours dealing with this thanks to uncaring companies who view people only as numbers.I contacted wisecars and told them of the situation. They contacted Fox who lied about my calls and claims. I showed wisecars photo evidence to back up my claims. They were unwilling to offer reasonable satisfaction and hid behind a dubious justification in their terms that only worked if they ignored my claims about how Fox handled the situation. They ignored my evidence and needs and stole from a struggling family by hiding behind "procedure" rather than having true consideration for a situation.DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE! AT THE VERY LEAST GO DIRECT AND SHOW THEM A SCREENSHOT OF WISECARS PRICE…THEY WILL MOST LIKELY MEET OR EVEN BEAT IT TO KEEP THE MONEY THAT WOULD OTHERWISE GO TO WISECARS IN FEES.

Review.Titre: Worst customer service - Scammed me
Review.Contenu: By far the worst customer service I have experienced in my life.I booked a car through their website for an airport pick-up. At the airport, the vendor failed to deliver the car and we had to scramble to make alternate arrangements, while traveling with an infant.It has been 6 months since this happened, and after 10+ calls into their customer service center, they have yet to issue me a refund - It is a total black box. I called the vendor directly, and they confirmed the funds are sitting with Wisecars.com. Total malpractice. Expect no protection in case anything goes wrong with your booking. Expect them to scam you out of your money.

Review.Titre: CAREFUL Switch and Bait with dates mixed up
Review.Contenu: Booked a car via this site, but after booking, the information provided didn't relist the date and other information with the confirmation email, something that is standard. Then when we arrived at the car rental counter, it turned out that the system must have malfunctioned and booked us a day earlier than what we intended. Since no car was available in our category, the rental car company (DOLLAR) charged us USD 460 extra instead of the USD 200 that was due for taxes. Honestly, this looked like a switch and bait. Mix up the rental dates, do not send a clear confirmation email and other information, dangle the voucher before the customer, which only arrives two days in advance, and then get charged a fistful due to wrong dates. I should have checked the voucher when it came. That was my bad, but I will never ever use Wisecars again.

Review.Titre: Avoid; car was double the quoted price on pick-up
Review.Contenu: Booked a rental with Enterprise through Wisecars. When I arrived the car rental was more than double what I was quoted with Wisecars. Given I was in Alaska with limited options I had no choice but to take the car and pay >1200USD more than quoted. Have complained over a month ago and received no response. Avoid and book direct.

Review.Titre: Terrible Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Terrible Customer Service!  I don't know if there is even a way to speak to a human. I was on hold listening to music and a recording telling me I was next in line, then finally after a very long time, a message said "nobody is available" and I was disconnected.

Review.Titre: The Worst Rental Company I’ve ever dealt with!!
Review.Contenu: I am having a woeful  experience with Wisecars. I posted here a few days earlier and you asked for my reference number ..well here it is 41633861. So far I’ve spent about 10 to 12 hours of my family holiday trying to sort their problem out. I arrived at the car rental depot  at Vancouver airport last Friday (23rd) to be told Wisecars had cancelled my prepaid booking. I had to pay again and it cost me significantly more than what I had already paid. I am very annoyed that they can’t seem to sort out something that should have been straight forward. I feel I’ve been left stranded. I would love to even get an update from Wisecars. I intend to write to as many papers, travel journals as possible to tell them of the nightmare experience I’ve had with Wise Cars

Review.Titre: The very worst car rental company I…
Review.Contenu: The very worst car rental company I ever deal with! Booked a car 4 month ago and pre-payed 2000$, unfortunately my flight got delayed and called the wisecar to rearrange. I was on phone with them for 4 hrs, wisecar can not do anything to change the reservation, neither can find me a new reservation. They tell me that all they can do is cancel the reservation and they charge 500$ for the can cancellation! Do not go with this company, the customer service has no toll-free number and they literally do nothing and then they can charge you a big $ for cancellation.

Review.Titre: AVOID THIS COMPANY
Review.Contenu: Booked a car for ireland through this company. I lost £200 because the company they booked wouldn't rent me a car as I have only had a driving licence for 1.5 years and they required 2. The checkout for wisecars clearly showed I only needed 1. Avoid this company at all cost!!!Edit:As of 23/09/2023 we have received no update on this past the reply below

Review.Titre: Worst car hire company i have used
Review.Contenu: Worst car hire company i have used in over 40 years of travelling around the world. Cost of hire doubled with hidden extras when at Ace car hire rental firm. Wisecars customer services totally uncaring and unsympathetic.

Review.Titre: Worst car I have ever rented
Review.Contenu: We used in October 2022. They were cheap but the quality of the car was the worst I have ever seen on a used car. Every panel was scratched or damaged and that was better than the first car they offered me.It had previously been in an accident visible from the door denting.Fox rental Staff in Orlando office were unfriendly and said wise cars insurance was a waste of time and I ended up paying hundreds of pounds more in insurance to get full cover. I was really worried about the car the whole time I was away given its condition.I took a video to prove I did not cause any damage.

Review.Titre: Booking was very easy/ waiting for pickup voucher not!
Review.Contenu: This booking was very easy, I just hope the car will be available for pickup and this is my first time booking through this company!🫡Update, after reading all of the one star reviews, and not receiving a confirmation pick up voucher for the car rental,  we decided to cancel with this company. They wanted us to wait until 48 hours of picking up the car to receive our voucher confirming their lowest price offered to us, Ridiculous!

Review.Titre: Ripped off!
Review.Contenu: Hired a car through Wisecars at the rate advertised. Received an email confirming that I only had to pay £128 on collection. When I went to collect they charged me over €350. Rental company told me there would have been missing terms and that was the rate. With 3 children just coming off a flight I had no choice but to pay it. Tried to contact Wisecars but no answer and still no response to my email 12 hours later

Review.Titre: Paid twice - No customer support, Money gone
Review.Contenu: We've done a pre-payment to Wisecars and had to pay the rest amount during pick up of our car at the rental company. The rental company did not receive the pre-payment, so we had to pay the full amount and ask me to contact Wisecars. I opened a ticket and got a feedback that my issue will be solved soon.Afterwards I've never heard something from Wisecars. I asked a couple of times but have been ignored totally. This is not the way how customers should be treated. I highly recommend NOT to book via Wisecars. Their customer support does not exist.Update 2023/06/25After the fast response of Rachel, I opened a ticket with exactly the Same content again to Wisecars. And make a guess what happened? NOTHING. I did Not Receive any response. Customer service is the worst ever.

Review.Titre: They took my money
Review.Contenu: They took my money.  That's about it, sent me a confirmation that they took my money.  Negelcted to provide a pick up location other than, the city of Mississauga.Update.  This extremely shady company is now outright lying.  They never did send the voucher at all, I ended up renting elsewhere and had to wait almost 48 hours for the money you robbed from me to be returned. Want proof? Additionally, who told you your phone rep helped? She hung up on me 30 seconds into the call because the time reached 7 pm eastern when your useless hotline with people that barely speak english closed. Please challenge  this review so I will be able to attach screen shots as proof of my claim and proof that you guys are outright liars and thieves.  Dare you.

Review.Titre: Worst rental company I have ever used!
Review.Contenu: This is the worst rental company I have ever used in my life. I had utilized their services in two different locations, kawaii and Hawaii. In both spots I had to wait well over 2 hours to get my car. When I walked across the street to Avis they were able to give me my car in less than 15 minutes. Highly recommend you use a different company. This one will lock you in to their contract with a $10 cheaper service rate. They're a joke

Review.Titre: Dispute left unresolved due to no…
Review.Contenu: Dispute left unresolved due to no response from customer service. We had to return the vehicle a week early due to not being advised on restrictions during the rental by either Wisecars or the rental agent. We only found out about these when the car broke down. Wisecars (nor the rental agent they represent) would not refund the unused prepaid week rental, nor cover the huge additional costs we incurred. (Luckily the roadside assistant told us of the restrictions else the consequences of invalidated insurance could have been much worse) Tried to resolve directly but am still waiting for a response after several emails chasing. During a two week holiday the car rental cost us more than four times the original quoted price.

Review.Titre: Be careful europeans
Review.Contenu: Be careful europeans. They rent cars without telling you that there is absolutely zero insurance on the car. If you want to just add a franchise of 1500€, you need to double the price of the renting. i felt it was a scam. Will never use again.AFTER THE ANSWER OF WISECARS: I rented directly on their website. How can you not see i am in Europe when i pay with a french card, have a European IP and give a French number for a rental in France. As I said just scammer and not willing to pay back for their mistake.

Review.Titre: Very unwise to give Wisecars your money…
Review.Contenu: Expect for Wisecars to keep your money and be refused a car at pickup. I rented a car through Wisecars only to be told at day of pickup that the vendor would not issue a car to me because I was traveling from Texas to Colorado and Colorado was outside their limit of travel. The car rental guy snidely told me I probably shouldn’t trust third party vendors because they don’t tell you all the rules. He said he marked my reservation as denied and to get with Wisecars for a refund. I then proceeded to another company in the airport and paid double to continue with my planned trip. I contacted Wisecars and they told me there were no refunds and it’s clearly stated on their contract, but they would make an “exception” for me and refund 75% instead of the full amount because they still had expenses to cover in “processing” my reservation and refund. I rebutted this decision but they again shot me down in flames. This was a very frustrating and disappointing experience with Un-Wisecars. I don’t want this happening to anyone else. Bottom line: go with a reputable first line company that doesn’t expect payment until you actually pick up the vehicle, and DO NOT deal with third party, bottom feeding, sweatshop boiler rooms. There are no free lunches.

Review.Titre: Extra insurance scam
Review.Contenu: Avoid this company at all cost! Zero customer service. Made a reservation for Orlando airport and got e-mail confirmation. Upon arrival with my family was taken to off-airport pickup location for their “supplier” Hub Rent-a-Car. The place was sketchy and I did not feel safe for my family. Customer service rep at the counter asked how I’m going to insure the car. I told her I’m not going to as my car insurance covers rentals and I also paid for reservation to Wisecars with AmEx, which covers rental car up to $85000. The rep kept repeating they don’t accept AmEx and don’t honour Canadian insurance policies. After calling Wisecars customer support I spoke with Vilol, who told me that even I decide not to take a car at Hub Rent-a-Car I will still be charged for full reservation as “it is active already” in their system. So I ended up paying $485 USD insurance charge even though I had valid insurance from 2 sources. This tripled the cost of the car rental. So this is trap to money from you. Do not follow this trap, avoid them, this is not legitimate business, Wisecars do not have own fleet of cars, only operate with “suppliers” who will try to extract more money from you.

Review.Titre: I’m extremely frustrated
Review.Contenu: I’m extremely frustrated at the service from Wisecars. Our car was vandalised and I have spent a whole day trying to get some assistance to get a claim number from wisecars insurance from Wisecars support both via email and and telephone with no success. I have a special needs child who is extremely upset because we are stranded. But no one from Wisecars will get back to me.

Review.Titre: I was forced to cancel my vacation and…
Review.Contenu: I was forced to cancel my vacation and in addition,   my rental car due to a serious bout of flu. I received no cancelation notice or refund. I will gladly revise this rating once this is resolved

Review.Titre: Absolutely awful experience
Review.Contenu: Absolutely awful experience, totally messed up our memorial weekend travel plans. They won't refund our money either. Stay away!

Review.Titre: They do not reserve your booking at the…
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: thank you for your response Rachel. Our booking is 58615285. I had contact before I posted this review with your collegues Emanoel and Angela. The rental company said that wisecars did not share the flight details and that wisecars does not give room for delays. People on the same flight who booked with another broker didnot have any issue. =====They do not reserve your booking at the carrental company, and they do not provide your flightdetals to them. In our situation we had a delay of approx. 4 hours because of weather conditions. We were marked as a no show and did not get our car. We tried to reach them, but they respond 6 hours later because they are not 24/7 open. I’m stilI waiting for my refund, in the meantime they are pointing at the rentalcompany to respond. I work many times with carrental brokers, this one is an absolute no go for me.

Review.Titre: Still waiting for our money back!
Review.Contenu: We rented a car on 12/28 and AFTER THEY GAVE US THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF THE RENTAL AND WE MADE THE PAYMENT there was a message titled IMPORTANT INFORMATION  where they said WE HAD TO PAY EXTRA 30$ PER DAY FOR THE INSURANCE.BUT THEY HAD ALREADY ACCEPTED THE PAYMENT !We cancelled immediately, we received the cancellation message and they told us the money would be returned to our account after 3-4  business days.We called them after 5 business days and they informed us that the cancellation process takes ONE WEEK and ANOTHER FIVE WORKING DAYS TO HAVE OUR MONEY BACK!!!SO MUTCH FALSE INFORMATION!! THESE PEOPLE ARE A TOTAL SCAM.THEY SHOULD GIVE US THE TOTAL AMOUNT BEFORE THEY TAKE THE MONEY!!!WE HAD TO RENT FROM ANOTHER COMPANY  AND WE HAVE TO TRAVEL BACK WITHOUT MONEY IN OUR POCKETS!!!

Review.Titre: The company WiseCars canceled my car…
Review.Contenu: The company WiseCars canceled my car the next day and then I find the same car listed the next day for $250.00 more.  Would not book through Wisecars if this is how they treat customers.

Review.Titre: Worst car rental service!
Review.Contenu: I only picked one star because I had to. How does this supplier have so many stars, they are horrible! All of these reviews must be botts! Read the reviews on Tripadvisor! Worst customer service all around from their email to phone. They rip you off and take all of your money and can't offer the rental that you paid for!

Review.Titre: Beware of Wisecars or you might be stuck like we were with no support!
Review.Contenu: Beware of this company!! We rented an Avis vehicle from them in Europe, with the reservation to be picked up at 6pm. When we showed up at exactly 6pm the shop was locked up tight. When I called “Wisecars” (nothing wise about them) they suggested that we pick the car up the next morning and offered NO other support after 6 calls!! I can prove our arrival time because I have a call record to their office at 6:01. We were stuck in a strange city with no car. We paid for our own hotel room and called wisecars and they promised a full refund if we had the reservation cancelled. We are having the call pulled. - she promised full refund no less than 3 times during the call. We left the city the next morning on the train. And now they won’t give us a penny back! So they don’t honor their reservations and they don’t honor their commitments. Don’t waste your money and book direct with the rental agency even if it costs more! I wish I had. We are going to make a claim on our credit card and will also notify the California authorities for consumer fraud.

Review.Titre: Book with eyes wide open
Review.Contenu: These are a broker ("middle man")Some might ask me why I didn't give this a "1 star" I will write "war and peace" and potential pitfalls and areas to look out for (I dont want others to suffer the same) if I get a reply to an outstanding query I have of an additional £900+ bill I've received on return from the USA. I returned from the USA on the 18th and on the 19th, I made my initial enquiry. Its now 1week later and still NO resolve to my request :(Part 2 (replying to Rachel's response an hour ago)Our booking reference: 56870606I'm still waiting for a reply from either Dominik or Emanoel "Your Fox reference number is FFX03A94F6"

Review.Titre: Scammers avoid
Review.Contenu: More like wiseguys! You pay in full up front for a rental. They then push out your booking to a dodgy little company.They might have a car for you when you turn up, they might not though. And they will both ghost you when you ask for a refund or to collect the vehicle at another time. They will just keep the money and ignore you.Don't be an idiot like me book with a known company (you will probably have to anyway when you get stranded at an airport by these rip off merchants).Just to update Wisecars have offered to refund 75% of the fee. It took a lot more persistence and cajoling with them than it should have and I was still left stranded at an airport. I would not recommend this company whatsoever but the 75% refund is reasonable as I was late for the collection, so thank you for making it right. Upped to 2 stars just about.

Review.Titre: The offer seem attractive but has hidden costs
Review.Contenu: The offer seemed attractive however due to the business model you only receive the form 48 hours before where it became clear that the insurance was not included, despite us selecting the premium insurance with excess waiver. Ie there was no basic insurance included in the price. When including this at the rental desk the offer becomes way more expensive.

Review.Titre: I called and the person on the phone is…
Review.Contenu: I called and the person on the phone is not able to give me the excess charges for the mileage (Maximum 3000 km for my rental), the range in the terms and condition is too wide. I have asked to add my Wife (not with me at the time of pick up), but I need to go to a supplier desk to register her as driver, how can this work for keyless pick up and drop off? The booking state that the pick up is in malpensa Airport, I now discover that the pick up is elsewhere in Malpensa, can you please clarify, do I need to get a taxi to get there or there is a shuttle? the reservation page was giving me 24 hours free cancellation, after the payment the cancellation if 48 hours prior booking. I have tried to modify the pick up time, around 10.30 am, but the system automatically put 12 pm when I do the booking, can you please amend, thanks Franco

Review.Titre: Beware - basic insurance not included in car hire
Review.Contenu: Beware - car hire does not include basic insurance cover. This must be paid locally. I was forced to cancel my booking as the costs are unknown. On the plus side Angela in customer services was helpful and handled my enquiry efficiently.

Review.Titre: Wisecars charges you a hidden 10% fee
Review.Contenu: Wisecars charges you a hidden, undisclosed 10% fee on your booking. They then claim this is their "commission". No, it's a hidden fee you charged ME, that's not a commission back from the rental company. My invoice from the rental company was 10% lower than you charged me. I could have just booked with them directly - and next time I will.No, burying this fact somewhere else on the website and not up-and-center when performing the transaction is NOT notice that you charge a 10% fee. Therefore, it is a hidden fee.This fee should be on the checkout screen as a line item so it's up-front. EG: "Booking Fee: ". Then I can decide if paying 10% more makes it the same or more as booking direct with the rental agency.

Review.Titre: Very underhanded company - selling car hire without insurance is just wrong!
Review.Contenu: Really not happy. I paid for extra protection insurance and had an email saying 'sit back & relax' it is all taken care of. Arrived to pick up car and was told I had excess insurance, but no actual basic insurance. I had to buy this at the counter. I called Wisecars who pointed out it was in the small print of the voucher which they send me after the cancellation period - I only got it after chasing them -  just 24 hours before I flew - I did not get it 48 hours in advance as promised - so could not do anything about it. I felt this was a real con  and they just weren't interested in helping. To be fair to Fox who were the rental company, they were really apologetic, but it was Wisecars that really caused the issue in the first place.I won't use this company again and am telling everyone I know to avoid them.

Review.Titre: Exceptionally poor after sales support service and absolute wreck of a car
Review.Contenu: Ease of booking and competitive prices score well. However, it comes down to the car you get and the support from them when there is a problem -- and this is exceptionally poor.We tried to contact them 3 times using their support email and finally using one of their website tickets after git a totally unroadworthy car with 325,000km (!) On tbe clock. It developed multiple problems over our q6 day rental.The response/reply from Wisecars ---- absolutely no response over tbe 2 weeks that we used their contacts.In short - good sales service exceedingly poor after sales service/support.

Review.Titre: the price quoted was £131 the booking…
Review.Contenu: the price quoted was £131 the booking took 166 euros which is £145 and more charges for exchange on my card

Review.Titre: Booking Reservation was a clicking/guessing game
Review.Contenu: Searching for and identifying the preferred car by price was easy.  Finding a way to proceed to book the reservation and make payment was a clicking game that took forever!

Review.Titre: Cancellation headache
Review.Contenu: We had to cancel within the 48-hour deadline. Despite extenuating circumstances, they insisted on retaining a 20% cancellation fee. I asked for a supervisor review. I was later informed that a supervisor did review the case and preferred to stick with their rigid policy rather than consider their customer's situation. They neglected to inform me of the supervisor's involvement. They care more about claiming every penny than about customer service. They lost me as a future customer.

Review.Titre: Changed reservation without telling me
Review.Contenu: Booked a 7 seater. My reservation was changed without notifying me. I happened to catch it and reached out to Wisecars. They would not honor my price or vehicle selection and cancelled the reservation. Update: they were able to rebook me but now I am stuck with some one off/no name car rental company and I am not able to get the car I need in terminal and have to travel off site. Very inconvenient when traveling with kids on early am flights.

Review.Titre: Nothing wrong with the car the review…
Review.Contenu: Nothing wrong with the car the review is completely down to the customer service we received. We were part of a larger party where we all were given different information on charges etc. I was advised that if I wanted my wife as a second driver there would be a $150 charge however someone else in our party had their wife added with no charge.We were advised that as we were travelling from Tampa to Florida and then to all the Disney parks in the area we would need to purchase the daily toll package at about $18 per day otherwise we would rack up a massive toll fee. We had the vehicle for 18 days so this would have cost over $300 and we never went through one toll. They tried to scaremonger the whole group into purchasing this which we all rejected and got told we would regret it however clearly not true and just tried to get more money out of us. The rental wasn’t cheap and everyone raves about American customer service however it was really poor. Wouldn’t recommend and will not use again in the future as they cannot be trusted.

Review.Titre: Nedal
Review.Contenu: Very good process and stuff was helpful, clean, new and comfortable cars, actually after the extra charge I got it won’t be 5 starts

Review.Titre: Poor policy for confirmation
Review.Contenu: I’m not happy that I won’t receive a confirmation until 48 hrs before the rental date, particularly because I have already paid for the bulk of the rental.

Review.Titre: I thought i had reserved a full size…
Review.Contenu: I thought i had reserved a full size suv. When we got to the rental counter the voucher said FCAR. Which according to Budget meant full size car not SUV. R were offered  prius or a truck neither were ideal.  We finally settled on the prius. I will not is wisecar again.

Review.Titre: Useless Car renting agency
Review.Contenu: I used them in Kauai, Hawaii to rent a car from the airport. They put me on to Dollar Car, the company that provided me the car. I had to send Wisecar reminders to provide me the contract which was sent only 24 hours instead of 48 hours. I stood in the queue for nearly 2 hours as I had already paid for the car. Wisecar could have advised that I could go through the paperwork by registering with Dollar on the internet. This would have saved me waiting in the queue. I would not use them again. I suggest that go to Dollar directly and register with them while on the islands of Hawaii.

Review.Titre: Disappointing booking experience
Review.Contenu: I used Wisecars to book a car with one of their partners called Virtuo, however I was unable to complete the prescribed on-boarding process with Virtuo. I contacted Virtuo support who were unable to help and didn't appear to know how the process should work, I then asked Wisecars for help, who after a couple of days of my chasing up eventually got back to me and redirected back me to Virtuo support again. It was only through self-directed troubleshooting and a process of elimination that I was eventually able to figure out what the problem was between Wiseguys and Virtuo and how to resolve it.

Review.Titre: Voucher
Review.Contenu: Although I have already made the payment I didn't receive the voucher which is promised for 48 hours before taking the car.

Review.Titre: Cancellation fee
Review.Contenu: Because I knew that I might have to postpone my vacation I checked before I booked a car if I could cancel the booking. That was no problem. So I went ahead and booked a car. But indeed I had to cancel. Turns out they have a cumbersome procedure to do this   and they charged me €47 as an fee for the cancellation. They refer to the fine print but it is not obvious when you book. In the future I won't use wisecars again. Expedia doesn't charge anything when you have to cancel a booking for a rental car. So I will use their services again.

Review.Titre: I wanted to contact wisecars for some…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to contact wisecars for some issue and nobody responded my calls.

Review.Titre: Initial cheap prices but doesn't include the extra taxes at pick up
Review.Contenu: Quick process with the best rates! Will update after I pick up the car next week about the pick-up process.Update: I had to pay additional taxes and fees to the rental car agency upon pick up. Wisecar prices were initially cheaper but after paying taxes and fees it ended up being the same price as other car rental agencies. I ended up paying an extra $200+ on taxes and fees.

Review.Titre: I ordered car for pick up at 10Pm
Review.Contenu: I ordered car for pick up at 10Pm. Flight gets in @ 9:50. Wisecars assigned me agency that closes @ 10:00. When I told them that wouldn't work they told me, to get a latter pick up would double the price. Bad way to do business canceled reservation.

Review.Titre: Caution - Reservations don’t equal your actual car.
Review.Contenu: I booked a car from Budget through Wisecars and was disappointed. I made a reservation for a small SUV and was given a small car instead. When I asked the Budget employee why I had a car and not SUV they told me that’s what came from Wisecars. I was on a tight timeline otherwise I would have called Wisecars to hash it out.

Review.Titre: Frustrated
Review.Contenu: My credit card company flagged Wisecar as fraud after the phone number listed kept going to voicemail and the company couldn't be verified. It took way to much hassle my card was cancelled and I had to change the dang reservation because of all the trouble on top of the car place being closed when I got to my destination. Frustrated!

Review.Titre: Unclear policy
Review.Contenu: Fine print About checking carriers requirements, credit card needed came after purchase was made.   Used Wisecars on 3 prior trips out of town and debit card was ok. But when I need a car locally in a hurry your requirements changed.  Your fine print about checking rental company’s policy was not clear. Makes me think your company knows this and purposely fails to make it clear. I know how algorithms work. Airlines do it, wisecars does it and the end result is always the same , the customer get the short end of the stick. You actually know approximately how many times this happen in a year. You profit and the customer get taken. #99682513   $84.24   You win. Send this message to the CEO and tell him the donuts are on me in the next meeting. Pete

Review.Titre: Car rental DIA Thrifty
Review.Contenu: I rented online via wise cars website. I paid per the policy. Got to Thrifty after I landed in Denver. They struggled to find my reservation at their counter. And than proceeded to charge my 80 more dollars in taxes and fees. No indication this would be presented to me with booking. It’s deceptive marketing. Rude customer service at Thrify. I wouldn’t use this website again, very misleading.

Review.Titre: I got charged about £100 more on the…
Review.Contenu: I got charged about £100 more on the car rental when I went to collect it from the desk. The £20 I paid up front to wise cars was deemed a “ booking fee” and was not subtracted from the total. The car itself was great but at a rather extortionate price compared to advertised.Just to clarify the booking advised rental would be about £130. The airport desk have charged approximately €230

Review.Titre: Easy to book but inaccurate pickup location and slow customer service
Review.Contenu: It was easy to make the booking and to find a good price. However, Wisecars gave me the wrong pickup location ("King's Cross Railway"), where I went and found no car rental company. I wasted twenty minutes figuring out that the actual pickup location was a fifteen minute walk away. I tried contacting Wisecars customer service on their WhatsApp to clarify this and got an answer three hours later, after I had picked up my car.

Review.Titre: 2/5 stars.
Review.Contenu: I reserved a car for a recent trip to Atlanta at an excellent low price. I was contacted less than an hour before I got on my stating that the rental company lost my booking, and my choices were "pay more or cancel my reservation." This is not really a choice.
