So, I opted to pay more for another company. Based on other reviews on Yelp and Tripadvisor, this is a fairly common practice.I would not likely use them again.

Review.Titre: Wisecars says my reservation is…
Review.Contenu: Wisecars says my reservation is nonrefundable. I can not get the rental company to accept my debit card so i can not rent the car because the voucher is in my name i can not have my mom pay with her card. Im out almost 200 because of this problem and theres no way to call anyone at wisecars to straighten this problem out. I only have 24 hours to cancel and can not reach anyone to do so.

Review.Titre: free cancellation if you loan us the money for a few months then leave a negative trust pilot review
Review.Contenu: I purchased a free cancellation car rental and found out four days later that I would have to cancel it. When I tried to cancel it, wise cars refused to refund my money any sooner than after 60 days. I should have stopped payment on my credit card. Now it has been well in excess of 60 days, and I still don't have my money. Looks like it wasn't free cancellation after all.Update: The refund is now pending, so the cancellation policy is: "free cancellation if you loan us the money for a few months then leave a negative trust pilot review."

Review.Titre: IT issue from Wisecars left me without a car
Review.Contenu: I booked a car online and when I went to pick it up - the confirmation hadn't gone through. We called Wisecars support from the car rental place and Anthony (from Wisecars - who was excellent, by the way) said it was an IT system issue on their end. Although he couldn't help me on the spot (we would have had to wait another 2 hours) he handled our issue professionally and efficiently. Overall, not a good experience with Wisecars - but some times issues happen.

Review.Titre: do NOT recommend to use WISECARS
Review.Contenu: I booked one vehicle at LAX airport and here is my experience with them, 1) waited long time for pick up at the airport (closed to one hour) because they do not have shuttle bus like others 2) the rental car was nice, new and clean 3) I was requested to pay full again at LAX airport office even I paid down payment already 4) it took one week to solve my payment issue, too slow and too much complicatedI do not recommend you to use this company, cheaper with high risk

Review.Titre: There are better providers
Review.Contenu: I don't recommend this company. After two booking modifications they deducted us 35 Euros, which we acknowledged and accepted. After requesting the receipt for those costs however, they say they can't provide it out of some irrelevant reasons. We need the receipt for our Accounting Team, but the Wisecars Team is just useless! Waste of time and money. Will never book anything there anymore.

Review.Titre: Really bad experience actually
Review.Contenu: Really bad experience actually. I entered my pick-up and drop-off times when making the order, placed the order, then my voucher had incorrect times that were different than what I entered. When I tried to update the times, I was told it would cost me an additional $200, which is actually absurd. Would not recommend, I feel like this was shady and sneaky and not transparent at all.

Review.Titre: We waited in a one hour line at the…
Review.Contenu: We waited in a one hour line at the Denver Airport EZ Car Rental location.  That was unacceptable and seriously delayed the start of our trip.  There should never be a one hour line to obtain a rental car.  Once we were helped, the manager was nice and did her best to help.  The car itself was good and the price was fair.  Unfortunately, the long line soured us on the entire experience.Booking reference:  29075171

Review.Titre: Never again
Review.Contenu: Taking the car at Biarritz airport was OK except that I got a very small car and not the economic class that I had booked.The employees were very friendly and told me the order was transmitted by wisecars for such a small car and not the economic class.Returning the car at Bordeaux train station was very difficulat as the adress that was given to me by wisecars was wrong.

Review.Titre: Service people friendly but location…
Review.Contenu: Service people friendly but location VASTLY understaffed.  Our flight arrived in Denver around 8:30 PM.  Arrived at car rental location around 9:15 and found 6 people in line.  Each customer took at least 15 minutes to process.  Almost nothing is digital based; most info is registered by hand.  3-4 more transport vans arrived with people and line swelled to nearly 20 with only 2 attendants.  HORRIBLE.  Will not rent from this company again.

Review.Titre: Final payment was £300 more than original quote
Review.Contenu: We got a quote for £30 for the 4 days.We arrived to collect the car and asked to upgrade our car which the lady at Maggiore told us it would only cost us £30 a day and we won’t pay any extras. When we dropped the car off on return we were told we owed £450 due to taxes that we weren’t told about and extra charges.Will never book with maggiore again

Review.Titre: Lower standing that what I booked...
Review.Contenu: I booked a 15€/day car with a good standing as a Toyota Yaris or similar, and I ended up with a really old car with no trunk and the only possibility to put music is a CD reader... I am supposed to do a road trip with it and I don’t even have the place to put my backpack in the car... I had the possibility to rent car like that for 10€/day.. I’ve got the feeling to be fooled because it really don’t worth the money I put in it!

Review.Titre: I got excited because I thought I had…
Review.Contenu: I got excited because I thought I had found a less expensive car rental for a 3-week period with WiseCars while we visit with family. Throughout the reservation process i read that you could reserve without pay but in the end there is a payment required and it turns out there is a fee for cancelling PLUS the rental is costing more then what i had found on other sites for a larger car!!  Mucho mucho dissapointed. I’m reluctant to keep car reservation!!

Review.Titre: Not Reliable
Review.Contenu: Poor customer service.  Difficult to contact.  Phone messages are not returned.  Phone rings with no answer.  Four out of five customer service agents misdirected , misinformed  or didn’t follow up with my request.  One representative actually listened and a refund was issued as promised.  The whole process for refund took @ 45 days. 😞

Review.Titre: Don’t purchase their insurance
Review.Contenu: Wisecar offered me a product (car insurance) that couldn’t be used in the country I visited and would not refund me for the insurance portion. Wisecar claimed it was because I took out insurance with the supplier when I didn’t have to. But in reality, I did have to because the insurance Wisecar supplied me would not have covered an accident in the country. It was equivalent to purchasing a product that doesn’t work. You’d want your money back too if it were you.

Review.Titre: Wisecars find good deals, but bad company are used
Review.Contenu: Wisecars find you good deal, but bad company did welcome us to portugal ace rent a car, golden car rodhium. I bought a special insurance to be relax on holidays. Arrived at the desk, they told me if i don't have a credit card (i do have a debit card) i have to take the big insurance 109€ in plus of the one i took (no deposit accepted) so 1,5 time the price of my initial booking, no other choice!!! Never happened to me in different company... Very unpleasant at the start of the holidays.

Review.Titre: Booking through wisecars was not a bad…
Review.Contenu: Booking through wisecars was not a bad experience and the pricing appeared fair.  When we picked up the car, the experience went south fast unfortunately.  The agency was through a third party provider, and the car provided was a 2005 Ford Fiesta with limited A/C.....yes, a 2005 vehicle (in 2018!).  Given the car was in Greece in July, the A/C was definitely a must.  Additionally, the car itself was in poor condition (smell, wear and tear, etc.). Very dissapointed.

Review.Titre: Confusing charges
Review.Contenu: Now that I booked the car, 50 more euros was added to the payment to pay at the counter. This amount was not shown when I was searching for the best deal.That also happened to the initial payment that was already charged, about 10 more euros was added to the charge.

Review.Titre: I just hope I get a Camry as booked and…
Review.Contenu: I just hope I get a Camry as booked and not a substitution when I arrive at the counter.Sure enough I didn't get a Camry which had a power seat that I needed because I am tall . The vehicle I received had stained   seats with a cigarette burn.  I am downgrading my review from 5 star to 2 star.The price remained the same.

Review.Titre: a total price was quoted at the time i…
Review.Contenu: a total price was quoted at the time i entered my credit card information and had to agree that was the price . after i hit the book it , it went to the final page where it added 76.00 to the amount i agreed to. they did not include all the sur charges at the time i finalized my purchase . they advertized the Total amount due and the after the transaction was complete they added the extra charges . i don't think that is a good way to do business. jim boland

Review.Titre: Wisecars - we broker you through shady car rental agencies
Review.Contenu: The rental car was fine, the price of Wisecars' insurance was great, but the agency they book for me was terrible. In the end was charged more than 2x what was advertised due to shady practices of the agency. Would recommend booking with care and making sure the underlying rental agency aren't crooks

Review.Titre: We booked via Wisecars a car at…
Review.Contenu: We booked via Wisecars a car at Enterprise car hire at Porto, Portugal. I was clearly confirmed that the car would be available at 14:00 hrs in the afternoon. But once there, the Enterprise car hire firm said that there was no car available until 17:00 hrs in the afternoon. They did not want to take any responsibility for the confirmation of car availability at 14:00 hers, as this was for them a matter "between us and Wisecars".Poor performance of Wisecars

Review.Titre: Booking cancelled by Wisecar 3 days later.. :-(
Review.Contenu: Booking was cancelled three days later by WiseCars no specific explanation given just a list of potential reasons.  I now have to go through the whole process again.  Since the only reason listed that would explain the cancellation is the lack of available cars this should have been checked at the point of booking.

Review.Titre: I booked a car and was shown a total…
Review.Contenu: I booked a car and was shown a total that turned out to  not be the final total. Apparently the location I was renting from requires a toll/pass but the price was not reflected in the total right above the "book" button. It took about 20 messages but they finally gave me an option to cancel by writing a review. I give this experience 1 but am rating it 2 stars since at least they gave me a coupon cancel? Maybe they don't realize the booking problem on screen so I'm hoping they fix it.

Review.Titre: I signed up for a Nissan Sentra or…
Review.Contenu: I signed up for a Nissan Sentra or similar.  Ended up with a jalopy Hyundai Elantra.  So disappointed.   Also, I was not told that  Wisecars is not the rental place.  It took a taxi ride and several turn arounds to figure out that the rental place is Green Motion in Orlando.  UGH.  Never again Wisecars!OK so my mistake in that Green Motion was listed on the agreement.  But the car that I signed up for and the car that I ended up in was not acceptable.  The Elantra was seriously a piece of s&%^!  Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: Useless website for change/modification/cancel
Review.Contenu: Horrible website.  Need to make a change, told to go to self serve portal and sign in to cancel or change reservation.  This action is impossible because there are no options for change.  Call customer service and a forever wait.  try later  and again later.  While on hold and endless loop of 'visit our self serve...;

Review.Titre: Can’t get hold of wisecars for a refund
Review.Contenu: I used another company last week to rent a car with no issues. Booked for the first time with Wisecars over the weekend, however the first rental was in a congestion zone so cancelled it with the rental company. Could not get hold of Wise cars to refund my deposit. (Reservation no. 99892695)I then booked another car the following day. This time, I paid the full amount, however, Sixt would not release a car to me due to points on my license. Again, tried several times to contact Wisecars and still have not heard back from them for a refund. (Reservation no: 62878063)

Review.Titre: I booked a reservation for 12pm
Review.Contenu: I booked a reservation for 12pm. When I got there they told me the person returning the car I'm getting is running late. I didn't finally get the car til two hours later. I feel I should've got a discount since when I made reservation it said you guys had the availability to give me a vehicle at that time.

Review.Titre: too long of wait for pick up from…
Review.Contenu: too long of wait for pick up from airportcustomer service was good very nice and helpfulcars were dirty to select from windows damage and needed oil chage. i had to take only car left. while driving oil light low tire pressure came on. i had to put air in rent a car myself not good plus take it thru car wash. unacceptable

Review.Titre: Car pick up was terrible
Review.Contenu: Car pick up was terrible.  I was told to call and someone would meet me with the car.  Wisecars never answered the phone for over an hour.  Finally I went to another car rental company and they helped me get a hold of Wisecars, but it took them about 20 minutes to get an answer.  Car return was the same problem.  Finally the check-in person walked up to the car, when I said I was calling for the last half hour, he said there was something wrong with his phone.  Car was OK, service was terrible.

Review.Titre: The reservation stated free…
Review.Contenu: The reservation stated free cancellations, I tried to call and could not get through. I emailed and did not ever receive a reply.This business is Claiming a lot of services, but good luck getting them to actually provide the service.If there are no problems, the service would still just be average.

Review.Titre: Booking process OK but poor customer service
Review.Contenu: The booking process was straightforward and car rental deal seemed good value for money in the first place... Then it all went wrong and turned into a dreadful and pricey experience... Hefty hidden fees from the rental car company which I reported to Wisecars and asked for help in recovering. It seems Wisecars 'support' team was not interested in hearing about my experience, showed no effort of understanding my point, and instead kept replying with irrelevant answers or extracts of their T&Cs. That's me done with Wisecars indeed!

Review.Titre: Use outside agencies
Review.Contenu: They use untested outside agencies to fulfill their bookings. When I tried to pick up my car at Addcar, they said their computer was down and couldn't give me a car to rent. After waiting an hour to get to the rental agency, I was on my own with no car. This is probably a shortcoming of Addcar.

Review.Titre: Careful
Review.Contenu: Bad experience. Called several times to ensure I could pay with a debit card. After having been told that indeed I could, I arrived at the airport and was told there that if I wanted to pay via debit card, I needed to pay for the insurance (160€ for a week).Contradiction in what the company is telling its clients. Moreover, once you book the car, they will ask you for a review on trust pilot before you take the car to get a free cancellation protection. I'd qualify this as not very honest (how can you review a company before having experienced their service?).

Review.Titre: Information was extremely hard to find
Review.Contenu: Information was extremely hard to find.  Does rate include a spouse as extra driver; what constitutes age fees and when are they applied, cancellation and refund policies.  None of this was clear and/or had to be dug out on rental car company web pages.  Rates are good.

Review.Titre: Renting the car was very easy
Review.Contenu: Renting the car was very easy. staff answers quickly if you have issues. Great rates but Unfortunately. when I went to pick up the vehicle there was an issue which I reported right away. I needed a modification for the next day pick up and they wouldnt do it. They wanted to keep my monies even tho issue was reported at the location to make them aware. So I was told they couldn't give me a refund and I could not rent the car because the pick up date passed which was less than 24 hour period.I sent emails and I called them. it's not cool. I was going to a graduation. Now I no longer have the funds to rent another car. I'm not able to attend graduation.  This sucks

Review.Titre: Wisecars is not the cheapest and misleading.
Review.Contenu: The rental agency said Wisecars is only a voucher to be applied to the cost of the rental and not the final cost of the rental, I was not expecting to be told that at 2am in the morning that what I assumed already paid for online through Wisecars was not the total cost thinking I got a decent price on a rental. Therefore i had to pay more out of pocket to get my vehicle and should have booked through a different online vendor.Didnt give 1 star because no one was rude to meat wisecars, and the rental agency was nice and explained it all to me and they have nothing to do with wisecars.

Review.Titre: Choppy cancellation policy
Review.Contenu: Choppy cancellation policy.  Had to ask for the refund twice, manually.  Holding my money for 14 days and trying to blame it on COVID when we can see reviews here mentioning the same shady practice in August 2018.

Review.Titre: It is very easy to book and they will…
Review.Contenu: It is very easy to book and they will always take your money,,. But when you need them to act in your behalf they are not as committed.   I purchased a.full to full hire car and on arriving at Italy using Ecovia we were informed that the car was not full and their policy was for us to rerun the car empty.... we did not even rerun the car completely empty and we have been charged for fuel even though they broke the original agreement they state we are in breach of contract and no refund !!!!! Be carefulHello wisecara I ha w already asked for your help and it was not very helpful at all.,..I have also contacted Ecovia and they are even less helpful

Review.Titre: None of the arrival instructions were…
Review.Contenu: None of the arrival instructions were accurate, wasted 2 hours following them. Lucky I got a car at all. Budget hadn’t heard of wisecar. Fastbreak kiosk was not the place to go.  No wisecar desk existed.  Almost a sham.

Review.Titre: Bait & Switch
Review.Contenu: The process was easy and the prices good. However, we reserved and paid for a "large" vehicle, which was the biggest option next to an SUV. When we got to the rental counter, we were told that we had reserved a "compact" car. Since we were in a hurry to get to the hospital for a relative, we didn't take the time to make any calls or submit a dispute. When I emailed Wisecars later that day, they told me since we had picked up the vehicle, there was nothing more they could do, and they would not be able to refund the difference. I asked them where we went wrong and why it didn't show a "large" car reserved, but I have not heard back. Be careful.

Review.Titre: A bit rubbish
Review.Contenu: A bit rubbish. Hired a car in Italy. But given a car with full scratches. And charged me for the damage on the existing scratch. Contact them for over a month, but still have no resolution at all. Had to contact my credit card issuer to stop the payment

Review.Titre: Not for someone under 25
Review.Contenu: I had a very poor experience with Dollar car rental. I had to switch here after reading reviews on a different car rental company and just not feeling good about renting from them. At first dollar looked like the right choice for me. I am under 25 and specifically clicked that I was in the age range of 21-24. When I was given my price it was high however, I assumed this to be due to my young age. Nope, when I went to rent the car, they charged me an ADDITIONAL $200. I was very upset as this just turned into a $600+ rental. I will not be returning to dollar rental.  This was the worst part of my trip.

Review.Titre: Email promises free cancellation up…
Review.Contenu: Email promises free cancellation up until the time of pickup, but website makes it extremely difficult to figure out how to cancel. (And cancellation can only be done through a support ticket.) Do not do business with this company.

Review.Titre: The ‘excess protection’ is misleading
Review.Contenu: The ‘excess protection’ is misleadingly termed at the point of sale, and left a bitter taste. Once you purchase the ‘excess protection’, the email that follows it up is then even more misleadingly titled, given it had the heading ‘Information about your Wisecars Full Excess Protection’You have to dig into the T&Cs before you discover it actually only covers the first $1,000 of any loss. The rest is on you. That is in no way ‘excess protection’ or ‘full excess protection’. At best it is excess mitigation or reduction, so this is borderline mis-selling and you shouldn’t have to dig into the depths of the T&Cs before you establish that you are still very much liable for any excess over $1,000.

Review.Titre: Not what we paid for
Review.Contenu: This was the first time we used Wisecar to book a car for pickup at Santorini airport, Greece. We had booked a medium size car,which we needed to accomodate family of four together with luggage. However, at time of pickup Eurocar provided us the smallest car possible and it just ruined the whole experience. Kids had to put some suitcases on their laps to make it work. Showing rental car company copy of email reservation etc did not matter and their attitude was basically take it or leave it. I would have given one star but at least their was no issue at time of returning the car - I have read about horror stories where travellers are charged other extras at time of returning rental car

Review.Titre: No car available
Review.Contenu: Booked a car for the next day and arrived to be told my reservation had been canceled because they were fully booked. I received no notification of this (email or phone). They offered me another vehicle for 5x the price.

Review.Titre: I could not print out my voucher when I…
Review.Contenu: I could not print out my voucher when I needed it. The customer service phone line was continually busy so no one could help me. I emailed but got a response the next day. I have a different car rental by then

Review.Titre: Wisecars as an agent are fine however
Review.Contenu: Wisecars as an agent are fine.Some of their suppliers are poor.Go Rent A Car Barbados does Sharp business practice and charges excessive for minor damage. They farm this and excess insurance cover.Avoid.

Review.Titre: I booked a Volkswagen Passat in…
Review.Contenu: I booked a Volkswagen Passat in Bulgaria but when I arrived they offered me a Clio ! I called them to cancel and so they did but I had to wait almost two months before being refunded.

Review.Titre: There are a lot of fees and I'm not…
Review.Contenu: There are a lot of fees and I'm not even sure what all of them mean....all of this should be taken into account when picking out a car because then it doesn't seem like you're hiding fees.

Review.Titre: Wisecars is a broker
Review.Contenu: I was surprised to find out on arrival that Wisecars is only a broker and not an actual car rental company. I had one contract sent when I did the booking on the internet, and another with other conditions at the local agency/supplier which was the actual legal document. I later found out that this is actually stated in the 16 pages (!) of conditions I was sent by Wiscars. The booking document said pick-up "air-port" and stated the general address of the supplier as the address of the air-port. The pick-up was actually 3 km out of the airport in a residential neighbourhood. I chose this company by comparing it to other companies that were actually located at the airport, as airport location is a service I am willing to pay for.

Review.Titre: Mixed Experience in Mytilini
Review.Contenu: I had a mixed experience renting my car in Mytilene. The car they originally wanted to give us had tires that didn’t match and one was a retread that was falling apart (we could peel pieces of the rubber off with our fingers!) When we pointed out the problem they first told us it was fine. Then that said we could have another car, but had to drive about an hour out of our way to get it. We did so and then had to wait 20 minutes for it. In the end the second vehicle had good tires and serviced us well, but it came with an unnecessary hassle. The roads on the island have many ruts, twists and turns and the original tire could have put my family in danger.  This car came from a local subcontractor and Enterprise should monitor whom it collaborates with more closely.

Review.Titre: Impossible to know how much you are…
Review.Contenu: Impossible to know how much you are actually going to spend on the car rental due to hidden fees.In response to your question. I cancelled the reservation once I arrived at Barcelona's Airport. The car I had rented through you for 45.80 Euros (89936529 - Wisecars Cupón de reserva de alquiler de coche - Aeropuerto de Barcelona, España) turned out to cost 180 Euros. Fortunately I was able to rent a car at the counter at Sixt for 112 Euros. I was still charged for a booking fee by you.I don't recommend your services due to the lack of clarity. You can't sell car rentals by only stating the daily rental fee and not including whatever extras might be included.This feels like false advertising.I recommend more clarity so that you can take better care of your customers.

Review.Titre: I have been walking around the airport…
Review.Contenu: I have been walking around the airport / called for the shuttle / and I guess it closed at 11. I wish it would have flagged me when I booked online.

Review.Titre: Am still waiting for customer service…
Review.Contenu: Am still waiting for customer service to call/email me back.  Car company forced me to upgrade at significant cost and tried to charge extra for insurance I already paid wisecar for.

Review.Titre: Only two Stars now, I hope to give Five Stars after having Rented
Review.Contenu: When I reed a review concerning car rental, I , ( and I bet most costumers do) thing the review is about the whole rental period, from the moment you chose your dealer and to the moment you deliver the car back. Reading the many very positive reviews here, makes it clear, that most starts are given JUST and only for the process on your PC.They even lures, giving you a longer period of regret, if you write a review.  Wisecars ought to  make it quite clear, that most reviews here, nothing has to do with the companies ex.: Hertz, Europcar, enterprise, Sixth, Avis, Budget. My rental period is in April in USA, and until it is finished, I am not able to give starts for the whole rental period. I really hope I will be able to give 5 stars then, but until Wisecars chance their procedure I can only give twoMmhErling Jakobsen

Review.Titre: Displeased with wisecars and companies it works with…
Review.Contenu: I didn't have a good wisecars experiance the car I booked was with a company that said it was located in the airport terminal of FLL! Come to find out it is off site and it was a pain to get to ...not to mention the company that booked my car added hidden charges when I inquired to add another driver they failed to tell me that it was a extra fee per day! It added up to a extra $100 and I wouldn't have dome it had I known up front. Now i missed their shuttle back to the airport because I need to dispute these charges and I hope I dont miss my flight! Too many liars at Ace rental car in FLL and they shouldn't be on your site or maybe wisecars cant get the information right! I would have never booked this rental if I knew before hand it wasn't in the airport terminal.              Kristen Vermillion

Review.Titre: Slow web site leads to double booking and pushback about canceling.
Review.Contenu: Rentalcars.com led me to a selection of vehicles at Wisecars. The prices were competitive, but the details ended up costing more. The slow performance of the web site did not instill confidence in me that my transaction had gone through. I bought their insurance. The hire fee was a different credit card transaction than the insurance cost. One transaction went through. The other got flagged as suspicious and declined by my credit card. The message I got was that the car was not available. So, I went somewhere else to get a car from a different company. Turns out that the charge for the car hire did go through, so now I have two reservations, but this one didn't immediately have a way add supplemental insurance. So I called. The representative kept trying to talk me out of cancelling. I finally gave up asking and will deal with this on another day.

Review.Titre: Staff not knowledgeable or bothered
Review.Contenu: Wrote to an advisor on WhatsApp who basically told me he didn't know and had no control over the "premium location fees'.Couldn't care less.

Review.Titre: The pick up place didn’t correspond te…
Review.Contenu: The pick up place didn’t correspond te what I demand (weren’t in the airport but in downtown)You charged me a supplement of young driver but I’m 46 years old!

Review.Titre: Wiscars Does Not Stand Behind Their Price
Review.Contenu: I rented a car through Wisecars for a visit to Austin, TX in early April 2022. Wisecars got me a good rate and later told me the rental would be through Thrifty. Wiscars charged me over $200 and told me I would owe another $127.83 at the Austin airport. When I got to Thrifty, their reservation said I would return the car to San Antonio, which I'm glad I caught and corrected. I was not charged by Thrifty when I picked up the car at the airport, but when I returned it I was charged $264.25, an overcharge of $136.42 by Thrifty. As soon as I noticed the overcharge I reported it to Wisecars. Their customer support is hard to access, they mostly want to run it through email and chat. Now 6 weeks later Wisecars says they are still waiting on Thrifty to respond. Wisecars refuses to refund me money and says they only have 1 person for their "special process" of requesting the long  line of refunds from Thrifty. I've already waited 6 weeks. No indication of if/when I'll get a refund. No communication unless I initiate it. Don't believe Wisecars' price if they won't stand behind it.

Review.Titre: There is no easy why to modify or…
Review.Contenu: There is no easy why to modify or cancel a reservation made through this site. All the other sites have a very easy link to modify. This one does not. Very frustrating

Review.Titre: Card info stolen from this website
Review.Contenu: Good on the booking but my credit card company thinks the website was not secure as my card was used fraudulently later in the day i made a transaction with Wisecars

Review.Titre: It took 30 minutes to fill the…
Review.Contenu: It took 30 minutes to fill the paper-work.Apparently they didn't know how to, it was neccesary for the manager to come along to solve the problem.

Review.Titre: I got a delivery car it's really crazy…
Review.Contenu: I got a delivery car it's really crazy what's going on here I needed a normal car to drive but buchinger just give us a bad car so wrong!!!

Review.Titre: No support on weekend for changing a…
Review.Contenu: No support on weekend for changing a reservation because of a cancelled flight. They wouldn't let the vendor make the change on their own.

Review.Titre: I had booked cars through Wisecars…
Review.Contenu: I had booked cars through Wisecars before and my experiences had been good. Not outstanding, but good. I must say that their pre-sales customer service reps gave me excellent service.This time, though, I booked a car with Centauro Rent a car out of Valencia's airport through Wisecars. I chose to book an "additional driver" for which, according to all the information Wisecars gave me throughout the booking process and up to the pick-up moment, was that the cost for it was 7 Euro.Come pick-up time at Centauro's desk the cost was 19 Euro. They wouldn't yield to my reasoning and the documents Wisecar had sent to me, stating that the was 7 Euro; so it was a take it or leave it situation. For all Centauro showed me on their system, their standard rate for an additional driver has always been 19 Euro. So I completed the rental; paid the additional 12 Euro and sent my complaint and request for a 12 Euro refund directly to Wisecars.After many weeks and acknowledgments on their side that I had a pending request with them, without any other answer, I have decided to write this report. If I lost 12 Euro, let it be to alert other customers about this unfair business practice.PS. Less than 24 hours from the time I posted the text above, Wisecars replied through Trustpilot and directly to me, stating that they would refund the 12 Euro I was claiming. They did so and I appreciate their promptness this time.

Review.Titre: Save yourself and book somewhere else!
Review.Contenu: At first, I thought this company was a godsend. Wrong. No wonder they ask for a review after all they have done is take your money and create a “voucher”.  Do not waste your time with this company! Save yourself the frustration and book somewhere else.  When I arrived to pick up the car, I was greeted with a sign stating the service desk has been closed for almost 3 MONTHS. I was directed to the service desk of a different vendor, who informed me that they could not honor a deal made through a third party (wisecars).  When I phoned the original vendor, I was informed that all they can do is cancel my reservation and book a new vehicle at twice the price! I, then contacted wisecars, who were only able to give me the same confirmation number information that I already had.  I was now stranded in my destination city because of this horrible excuse for a “car rental” company.  I will never make the mistake of working with this joke of a business ever again.  Again, save yourself and go somewhere else!-Updated to 2 stars only because they did give me a full refund

Review.Titre: Do not use
Review.Contenu: I bought from Wisecars after using a search comparison site. The airport was Tenerife South. I had in fact not hired from Wisecars but a company called ACE  who then in turn used a company called Rhodium who then in turn seemed to be a company called golcar... following?? Finding the desk was a problem as it wasn’t clear fromThe paperwork which one I use. I had the usual threats of a large excess if I didn’t take their insurance- but in addition I was told that should the car break down I am liable for the cost to return it to the airport. I ordered a VW Polo.. I ended up with a Ford Firsta..The car was an absolute state. The rear lights were cracked/smashed. There were actual pierced holes in the bodywork. Large scratches/dents all over the car - it had clearly been involved in some sort of crash/bump at some point - BUT should this car break down it would be me who is liable for the cost to return it unless I took their insurance out (I had my own 3rd party excess - but not road assistance)Do not hire from this company.

Review.Titre: When i call the french client service
Review.Contenu: When i call the french client service. I was frustaded by your employe. I have no anser to my question and he was unplezsant

Review.Titre: Beware of the terms and conditions
Review.Contenu: "" As we said before, once there is a rental agreement, you must deal with them directly. As per Terms and Conditions of the rental, "The legally binding document is the Rental Agreement between you and the Supplier that you agree with when the Supplier hands the rental vehicle over to you. Wisecars does not take any responsibility regarding any agreements you make with the Supplier."""Recently used Wisecars to book a holiday car. Overall service was good and customer service were polite. However, please beware the responsibility is all yours. Appended above is a most recent email exchange with them on a matter. Seems like, they are probably just scraping internet for deals and take no responsibility afterwards. You are most likely, will be on the mercy of the car rental company.  Best regards,

Review.Titre: Intransparent comparisons somewhat rescued by good support
Review.Contenu: The support was great.   What I dont like however, is that the prices quoted is not the complete price, as absolutely no insurance is included in the price comparisons.   That is not a transparent process.   Also some car rental companies allow my spouse to drive without an additional charge.  This extra charge amounts to over $500 for me.   Wise cars lacks transparent comparisons.

Review.Titre: Better prices, iffy website
Review.Contenu: Price was the best out of all competitors, but the checkout process was bad. Price kept changing and it would give me errors when I tried to check out, then the price went up when I refreshed the page. Magically it works then.

Review.Titre: Mix feelings
Review.Contenu: ***I am updating my review because the issue got resolved***I booked a car online and they charged on my Card within seconds but when I went to their third party rental company to pick up the car, they refused because the card did not work for them. I never used any service. It took 3 months and a bunch of calls to support center to process my refund.

Review.Titre: Onerous conditions are hidden away in Ts&Cs.
Review.Contenu: It was a good thing I looked through the 'Supplier terms and conditions' reasonably carefully. For overseas renters they require, in addition to a valid drivers' licence, (1) international driving permit; and (2) proof of home address. These are unusual requirements, in my reasonably extensive experience of renting cars in many countries. The supplier Ts&Cs also say that if you don't have the correct documentation you will be regarded as a 'no show' and charged the full amount but not provided with a car! This seems onerous. Such conditions should be highlighted more prominently.

Review.Titre: Website difficult to navigate. Too many redirects.
Review.Contenu: The links weren't worki g for a couple daysA few times I clicked on the car I wanted (on Kayak) and got redirected to WiseCars page but the car I selected wasn't on the list at all.At least one of the deals (A Santa Fe from Fox) was $800 more than advertised on WiseCars site. When I got to the pay screen the price was $2100 instead of $1325.

Review.Titre: An incident that never should have happened...
Review.Contenu: EDIT: Fox replied to say Wisecars can initiate a refund if they want to. Eventually Wisecars agreed to  a partial refund. The rote excuses, and being put through the wringer, should never have happened.  ORIGINAL:  They'll take your money but no car if you don't read the fine print.  Wife left stranded at LAX with Fox Rent-a-Car when she didn't have an "International Drivers Permit". She has a USA passport, UK driving license and proper credit card. We've rented >75 times over >25 years. We've never been asked for - let alone heard of - an "International Driving Permit". Never, not once. The IDP translates local driving licenses into multiple languages such as English.  Her UK driving license was already in English.  She was rejected and Wisecars and Fox kept all the money. Fox has no availability, so presumably has already rented the car and been paid twice. None of the above fits with the biggest words on Wisecars' website:  "TRUSTED" and "BEST PRACTICES". Fox at LAX also doesn't fit with Wisecars' other big slogan: "a wide selection of internationally known brands". Wisecars didn't even try to live up to its credo: "We are committed to providing an exceptional customer experience as well as outstanding care and support, and we enjoy helping you to get the best out of your holiday."  A rote apology was offered.

Review.Titre: Good Prices, but tricky interface
Review.Contenu: Website initially would not show all the rates. I had to come through an external website (Kayak) to access the most discounted rates.

Review.Titre: Payment needed to confirm your booking
Review.Contenu: Expected an email confirmation instead got an email asking to re-enter my payment information which felt a bit sketchy given that I had just entered this on your website.

Review.Titre: Somewhat confusing
Review.Contenu: Somewhat confusing - So who EXACTLY is the auto rental co and where are they located in the airport?

Review.Titre: Wisecars's voucher to poor cars rental company but the insurance works
Review.Contenu: Wisecars redirected me to a very poor company Budget that charged me for an unkown damage and then didn't respond me, didn't give me documents and the proof of the repair cost.At the end after I created a complaint against Budget I got the documents which I sent to Wisecars to refund the amount because of the Deductible Protection. Wisecars approved my requested and refunded the amount.

Review.Titre: Check who they are subcontracting to...
Review.Contenu: We booked through WiseCars, who we later discovered then subcontracted to a company called SurPrice. SurPrice then subcontracted again to RightCars.  Both of these other companies have TERRIBLE ratings and reviews in Trust Pilot.The booking included our flight information (Airline and flight number) so the rental company were able to track the arrival time in case of any issues.We had a meet and greet service booked and after boarding our flight we learned that the flight would be delayed by 2 hours. We made contact with WiseCars (who we had our booking with), and they in turn confirmed they had emailed SurPrice to inform them of the delay. However when we arrived there was nobody there to meet us. We called the local number given to us for "SurPrice". The representative said we were a "no show" despite us giving notice of the delayed flight and having given the flight details. He hung up part way through the call, and I had to call back to check they would still be coming for us.They collected us and drove us to a remote location and then said that as we were a "no show" they had cancelled our booking and if we wanted the exact same car it would now cost double as a late booking (Over 400 Euros). We explained that we were not a "No Show" and even showed them the emails giving notice of the flight delay, and the return confirmation from Wise Cars confirming they had informed the local car rental company in advance. They were not interested and just kept demanding my passport and credit card which I refused to hand over.This I feel is a deliberate scam from the local company to get people who's flights are delayed to a remote location and then extort money by cancelling the booking and demanding double the price when people are stranded and have nowhere to go.I tried to contact Wise Cars but was unable to make international calls and the email / webchat responses took so long to come back that we could not get any support from wise Cars in time to resolve the issue at the pickup desk.Luckily we had Turkish SIM cards and were able to arrange pick up from a different company at our original booking price. Wise Cars have now refunded the prepayment (after I reaffirmed that we had made proper notification of the delayed flight) which I do give them credit for (which is why I have given 3 stars and not less).I recommended WiseCars cease contracting to Right Cars or SurPrice in future.I would recommend any future customers check with WiseCars who they will subcontract to when making their booking and if it is SurPrice or right Cars then just don't book.

Review.Titre: must be improved. More informations
Review.Contenu: It was easy to find a car but i need  much more informations about terms and conditions from the supplier.

Review.Titre: Not telling what the company is until…
Review.Contenu: They only told me what company I would be getting after leaving a one star review. Otherwise you won't find out until 48 hrs before which is also the point when you can no longer cancel your reservation.

Review.Titre: Basically just a middle man
Review.Contenu: Basically just a middle man. Rental itself with Fox went smoothly enough but I did have an issue with being stung with additional charges. Emailed wisecars for support but didn't get any so went direct and got a refund.

Review.Titre: Amend booking
Review.Contenu: We wanted to bring our booking forward one day At the last moment because we wanted to our run the storm/hurricane but was told initially that we would have to speak to Budget directly on arrival. They were most unhelpful and said we should make any changes through Wisecars. We therefore had to book a hotel at MIA airport overnight costing $150+ with additional expenses. I tried to call Wisecars the next morning and had to wait on the phone for a long time. Eventually a young lady came on the phone and after giving her my booking number I was disconnected. She did not call back. I tried again and luckily this time Mikołaj picked up the phone and was helpful. He managed to change our booking to allow us to at least collect the car earlier than the original 9pm time. He deserves some credit because he was very helpful. The young lady and your wait times when calling was not. You should also complain to budget because the assistant that helped us the following day said that there was no reason the car could not have been given to us the night before. Who do e we contact for compensation for our unnecessary overnight stay?

Review.Titre: My experience with the company has not…
Review.Contenu: My experience with the company has not been great but Dmytro, the representative, stayed in touch with me with regular updates and was a pleasure to work with. He did not give up on my case and I am grateful for it.

Review.Titre: İ didnt get the rez Info to my email
Review.Contenu: İ didnt get the rez Info to my email XxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxRez 79901470

Review.Titre: The process of using Wisecars worked but…
Review.Contenu: The process of using Wisecars worked well. Unfortunately, the car firm they linked us up with - Virtuo - were not.Virtuo changed the booked car -ugrade replacement was very scary to drive; left us with out a car for 28 hours after a tyre mishap; made us use a French speaking assistance service rather than sorting problems via Virtuo agent; wrongly charged for missing fuel (twice, tho they refunded first one); haven't yet refunded the parking charge incurred when the car was collected; very slow to respond via their app. The Virtuo app is far from perfect. The experience would make think twice about using Wisecars again.

Review.Titre: How much is the insurance
Review.Contenu: You said we need insurance??? How much it will be per day or what plan. This is a pretty bad service

Review.Titre: Unexpected Insurance Requirement
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately was required to pay an additional $40 for "Loss of Use" insurance!  Have full coverage with Allstate so didn't expect additional cost nor to initially receive a 2017 vehicle that had transmission issues. Provided complementary modern vehicle upgrade.

Review.Titre: CCV number refused
Review.Contenu: For some reason, my American Express card was refused. The error message said that the CCV number was erroneous. It is not.

Review.Titre: First time renting a car and I am unsure of what I have paid for
Review.Contenu: First time renting a car and it took the payment before advising of additional fees. No contact information was provided on email. I am slightly worried about what i have paid for and am unsure of it is the best deal based on the minimal information provided during booking. If i were an experienced car renter it may seem very easy however for first time i am unsure.

Review.Titre: Cancellation impossible [until posting this review]
Review.Contenu: Offer said order could be cancelled free of charge up to 48hrs before the booking. Tried to cancel my booking via telephone and email in time, but the only response I got was the voucher for the rental. Customer service appears completely missing in action - impossible to reach via phone (number given in email out of order, number on homepage has voice message claiming I'm 'next in line' for all eternity, neither are domestic and thus expensive) or email ('ticket numbers' but no reaction). Hope to get some attention this way - and my money back! Otherwise, at least others are warned. Stay clear!EDIT:After posting this review, I sent a third cancellation email and Wisecars responded within minutes, confirming the cancellation. Hence the update from one star to three.

Review.Titre: When I booked this car in May 2021
Review.Contenu: When I booked this car in May 2021, it was for about $700.  I spoke to someone a couple of days ago and he gave me a discount making it $$440.  He did not tell he that I still owed $125 upon pickup.  When I received a voucher last night, it said I owed $565.  I called to cancel my reservation, but was told it had to be within 48 hours.  I can find a much better deal for $388, but was told Wisecars would not refund the $440.

Review.Titre: Most car rentals do not require…
Review.Contenu: Most car rentals do not require prepayment prior to pickup.

Review.Titre: It is too soon to tell
Review.Contenu: It is too soon to tell. I'm writing this review shortly after booking, a month prior to the rental. Wisecars asked for this review, however, so here it is. The website was easy to use and the price for the car rental was far below any other site. Almost too good to be true. I'll update this review after the rental if it is not cancelled. Hoping for the best.

Review.Titre: Now ones answer the phone
Review.Contenu: I got the car after wait more than 30 minutes in line and the man was attending me and talking we the next man working there. When i got ti the hotel i found out the car doesn't have the replacement tired i have been calling fron yesturday to 18008005252.  18002359393.  18008004000. 18772830898.  And nobody answer. I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO.

Review.Titre: Update to my complaint
Review.Contenu: I wrote a review last month blasting the company because I was unable to reach anyone in their New York office to help me with a rental car reservation with Avis.  Wisecars replied on this site saying they could not find my reservation, even though they had the reservation number.  I was charged an extra $106 at the Avis rental counter.  I was told it would only be $20.  And I was told I had to wait over 3 hours to pick up the car.  That did not go over well with me.Wisecar has since contacted me and is refunding the $86 extra Avis made me pay.  So I would like to thank them for that.Wisecars needs staff who will answer the phone when you need assistance.  I called twice and waited on line for more than 15 minutes, only to be disconnected.  That is not good service.  Therefore, I am only giving them 3 stars.

Review.Titre: I have submitted a cancellation but I didn't get an answer yet therefore it's too early to provide feedback regarding my experience. Hopefully all will be sorted out quickly
Review.Contenu: I have submitted a cancellation but I didn't get an answer yet therefore it's too early to provide feedback regarding my experience. Hopefully all will be sorted out quickly . Just a note from my side. Not everyone is able to speak English so the reviewer should be able to select the preferred language. Unless I missed this option.

Review.Titre: Competitive pricing, needs explanation for fees
Review.Contenu: The booking was straightforward and easy. I was quoted a price for the rental car but a fee was annotated at billing without any explanation. I suppose you could call and ask but it would be nice if an explanation is added in the online process. Offers competitive rates.

Review.Titre: Date error- emailed but no response
Review.Contenu: I signed up to return car on my last day of rental at 10:00pm. Confirmation shifted to 12 noon that day. I am getting medical treatment and staying 4 hours away from the drop off location -lax. Booked after hours. Sent email right away to customer service but did not receive any calls. I did pay for free cancellation. I hope this survey allows me to get trip cancellation at no cost as it’s being offered to current renters and I have yet to pick up the car. Thank you in advance.

Review.Titre: The booking process was easy and…
Review.Contenu: The booking process was easy and communication has been fine. I’m filling this out because we had to cancel our trip last minute due to increases in covid cases and I was told I was too late to get a cancellation refund and had to pay the full price of my reservation which seems a little harsh!

Review.Titre: I didn't know Wise Cars is not a car rental company.
Review.Contenu: My experience was good enough.  When I made the reservation I did not know that they are a car rental consolidator.  They do not rent cars, they only hook you up with rentals thru multiple rental car companies. They keep office ours in their call center and may not be available for assistance when you need them on site at the airport.

Review.Titre: Terms and Conditions Problem
Review.Contenu: I booked a car through Wisecars, but had a problem, because the terms and conditions listed when booking were different than those after confirmation and payment. I did not qualify for one of those. I called Wisecars and received friendly , helpful service from Ilmar. He eventually cancelled my booking and issued a credit that will become a full refund if I am not able to find a car rental that works for me on their website.Thanks Ilmar.

Review.Titre: First time user
Review.Contenu: First time user. Price was great and website was super easy to make a reservation. Likely to use many times over. Holding out for five stars until after actual rental period. Update: Changing review the three stars since canceled reservation so no on-the-ground experience.

Review.Titre: Unreasonable upcharges before correction/satisfaction
Review.Contenu: Unreasonable upcharges before satisfaction. This started off as a five star review. Have caution.  Be certain you clarify and coordinate your Pick-up and Drop-off times with your connections.  Simple administrative time changes, after you have placed the reservation, can result in a complete repricing.  Wisecars does not have an algorithm to catch your oversights, if you haven't done the coordination yourself.  My rate would have been penalized 25 pct. before my objections, a letter and a very competent Wisecar agent made it right.

Review.Titre: Simple and clear booking process - but watch out!!
Review.Contenu: Good, simple and fast booking process but watch out for the ToCs of the rental car providers - especially if you are a young driver and your age (in my case 20) matters.We couldn’t rent the car we booked because we found - of course after booking - that there is a minimum age and a minimum possession time of your drivers license in order to be able to get the car, but that of course wasn’t written anywhere on the booking we booked on.

Review.Titre: I feel a bit let down
Review.Contenu: While price was important to me, I am hiring a car at an airport and the pick up location was important to me.  I selected a slightly pricier rental company that said the pick up was at the terminal and after booking the car, I was informed that not only would the booking not be with the rental company advertised, the pick up location was elsewhere.  In my view, this undermines the point of using the wisecars search engine to choose car rental.

Review.Titre: the "get a car" web site was great ..
Review.Contenu: the "get a car" web site was great ...  however . there were no instructions on how to proceed once we were ready to pick up our car - - it was somewhat confusing ..  when I called the phone # , only after several attempts, did i get a person that I had a hard time understanding ..

Review.Titre: There are better rental firms out there
Review.Contenu: The booking process was easy followed by clear email communications and instructions how to collect from the airport.  In reality, what I booked isn't what we got on arrival.  Not an airport terminal collection but a meet & greet, was still asked to pay euro350 even though I had paid extra for waiver insurance and the car was full of dents.However, given all of that, the car got us from A to B fine.

Review.Titre: Have a lot of hidden terms
Review.Contenu: Have a lot of hidden terms, have used them before hope this new booking goes a bit more smoothly.All the good reviews are from people who have yet to use the services or collect there car, sent a email within 15 mins of making the booking to asking for a positive review to get free cancellations protection which when you read the terms of the offer cant be used on non-refundable bookings which all the bookings thought there website fall under this term.

Review.Titre: Different price at BUDGET car rentals
Review.Contenu: The prices for rental and the amount I ended up paying are totally different. Kindly include a disclosure on additional costs to be paid upon car collection as I was surprised to pay about N$4,545(which included a security deposit fee) at BUDGET  before I collected the car while the total cost shown on was N$1681. 21 on your wisecars site.It should be clearly stated the amounts to be paid before going to collect the car.

Review.Titre: Requesting access to my Facebook account for a customer service question is unnecessary.
Review.Contenu: So far it has been an easy process, except my attempt to ask a question via chat routed me to Facebook messenger in which the company wanted access to my personal profile. That's something that is not necessary for this kind of interaction, I have paid for a service and it's a reasonable expectation that customer service will be provided without having to disclose addition personal information. That attempt leaves me with an untrustworthy view of this company's operating procedures. We'll see how the rest of the experience unfolds and whether I receive the service as expected.

Review.Titre: Their price was cheaper than other…
Review.Contenu: Their price was cheaper than other dealers, but while opening multiple cars I forgot to select my start time for rental on the final transaction as 0800 and instead the default time of 1200 was submitted. Due to this change I am being charged $30 additional fee (possibly more as i didnt reply to their email immediately). When I had previously tried to rent the car for this time while browsing it was the same price.

Review.Titre: I rented a car from your website and…
Review.Contenu: I rented a car from your website and with the local provider "Nokta" in Istanbul. The local provider didn't provide me with a car and wouldn't answer phone calls/messages. Luckily Wisecars' operator was able to edit my booking and I finally got a car from Europecars. It took more than 2 hours and several phone calls to solve the problem. Now I have to claim for reimbursement in the difference between the original and final prices. I hope it will go through...

Review.Titre: Process was easy, car was bad.
Review.Contenu: The booking process with Wise Cars was straightforward and easy. I suppose my complaint is really with SurPrice, the agency that fulfilled the rental as I was not happy with the car I received. The car horn did not always work and I could not shift from 4th to 3rd gear without grinding the transmission. Wise Cars should ensure that the companies fulfilling their rentals are providing safe vehicles to their customers.

Review.Titre: Going through the reservation process…
Review.Contenu: Going through the reservation process was a bit scary since the total price is not displayed as you choose options like insurance etc. Also, why is there a fee for cancellation insurance. I was unable to find any clear statement of when I can cancel without charge vs. what the fee is after a certain date.  Cancellation charges are normal for hotels but not rental cars.

Review.Titre: Ordered an NISSAN ROGUE SUV or Similar…
Review.Contenu: Ordered an NISSAN ROGUE SUV or Similar and the reservation shows up as a VW Jetta. Very Annoying. There is no phone number to call WiseCars or live chat. Very Frustrating when a Mistake is made and we cannot get back to them immediately to rectify the Mistake. I have to fill out a form and wait 48 hours - in the meantime I have no way of knowing if the pricing goes up. 3 Stars for the great Prices.

Review.Titre: Good price, not easy cancellations.
Review.Contenu: Found better prices than on other platforms, but the cancellation process cannot be performed online, mostly via phone, having to call the US, which acts as a barrier to prevent users from changing their minds. Had the company made it as easy to book a reservation than to cancel it, I would have given a higher rating.I haven't picked up the car I reserved yet, as I am getting a benefit from reviewing the site early, so I cannot judge the quality of the merchants this site is dealing with.

Review.Titre: I rented a car in Iceland
Review.Contenu: I rented a car in Iceland, keflavik airport. The reservation stated Global Rental Car and location at the airport. The company did not exist and no one knew what and where it was. After a few phone calls, figured out the name is actually IceRental Cars and they are located 10-15 minutes away. Had to call them to get picked up and the rest was fairly ok.

Review.Titre: Easy booking site and competitive…
Review.Contenu: Easy booking site and competitive prices but we were disappointed not to receive the voucher until 48 hours before leaving.  On booking we heard that in order for the free cancellation to be honoured we needed to leave this review!

Review.Titre: I'm unclear on which rental service…
Review.Contenu: I'm unclear on which rental service I'll be offered. While I decided to go with this option for the first time, not knowing until 48 hours before doesn't instill confidence. If it all goes well, I'll change my rating.

Review.Titre: Cheaper than most, but at a price.
Review.Contenu: The price at the website is genuinely lower than the competition, yet it is a bit of a gamble. The reason is that crucial information about the car to be rented is withheld from the customer, such as year of production of the car (is it a relatively new car, or from the 90's?) or wheel driving type (2WD, 4WD, AWD?). Other than that the communication with Wisecars is simple and accessible, and the insurance seems to be cheaper than others (I have not filed a claim, I'm only speaking about the price).

Review.Titre: Not as low priced as you think- sad
Review.Contenu: Clearly your company it’s not all about low fees…When you arrive at the counter to pick up your car you find out that there are additional “optional products”. Not just tolls which are normal in Florida. Collision and damage fees, a minimum of $25 a day. Now your Wisecar is not so wise for the price!The car is the one I was promised:)

Review.Titre: I have rented cars before and my…
Review.Contenu: I have rented scars before and my credit union card has always been acceptable form of payment but when I tried to rent from Budget they did they would not accept it unless I was flying out of town ... I don’t have the funds to wait 3-5 business days to receive refund

Review.Titre: Don't be concerned about poorly written automated emails
Review.Contenu: After purchasing, I had some panic set in thinking this company was a scam. The automated email that I received after purchase had spelling/grammar mistakes which is typical of online scams. For example, under the "things to know" portion of the email, it says "If you are late for your pickup, you could LOOSE your car".I'm pleased that this is not a scam - they just have poorly written emails :) The price on our car was extremely affordable and the purchase was quick and easy.

Review.Titre: Average rental car experience but car could use some maintenance
Review.Contenu: Initial pick up location was easy to find.  The wind shield wiper was broken when we arrived.  They used a nylon tie to tie it back on vs. giving us another car.  The car indicated full but after 2 km indicated 7/8 full, therefore the tank wasn't truly full on pick up.  The windshield was very dirty despite them coming out to clean it which didn't really help.  The drop off was confusing as the office was closed for siesta.  This was not included in the general directions given initially.

Review.Titre: Complicated for not much savings!
Review.Contenu: Complicated for not much savings!The rental company did not send me any pick up info. Once I got to the airport, I thought that there would be a Wise car couter or one of the rental company. Nothing. We asked and looked around but were unable to finf a pick up spot. Called Wise cars, who gave me the local number for rental company.  After sevaral atemps, finaly put got in touch with the rental company and from there, all was fine.I think it's better to deal directly with the rental companies.

Review.Titre: Transparency... not so much.
Review.Contenu: The rate from Kayak said $190 total. But when I went to book the rental, the total was actually $260 and change. For promoting total transparency... That was not appreciated.I don't have a voucher from Kayak. It was a click-through. I understand there are fees, but when something says "total" you expect that to be us that... the total. If it doesn't include the fees, you and your partners should make that painfully obvious. I don't need you to call me and explain this to me. I'm not a dolt.

Review.Titre: So far the experience has been good
Review.Contenu: So far the experience has been good - easy to book the vehicle. I am confirming the reservation and ability to make specific requests through the rental company directly. Will update my review. - Matt N

Review.Titre: Great pricing compared to other sites
Review.Contenu: Great pricing compared to other sites.  Although, frustrating you are unable to amend your own booking online and have to either email or call the UK to cancel or amend your booking.  It would be far more convenient to be able to make these changes yourself online.

Review.Titre: Payment confirmation and voucher was not syncornised
Review.Contenu: The reservation process was easy, but although payment was done and there was a page confirmation saying that payment was done, no voucher was sent.The customer service were efficient and quick, but the did not solve this internal problem, but rather sent me to do a new reservation

Review.Titre: We'll see
Review.Contenu: I won't be picking up my car until January, so I'm not sure why they want me to rate them now.  The website was super slow when I was booking because of some 3rd party script, so I almost gave up. I've heard bad things about this company, but we'll see how it goes.

Review.Titre: 3 stars until trip is complete
Review.Contenu: 3 stars for now, I will review again after I receive my pick up information for the company I rented the car. I received an email from Wisecar requesting I write a review of my booking experience to receive free cancellation of my reservation booking.  That’s kind of strange, when I book full refund was offered if I canceled 48hrs prior to pick up.  I’m writing this as CYA in case I need to cancel.  I have to admit I am a bit nervous to see if this company comes thru or not. For now, I will remain hopeful and pray that all goes smoothly upon my arrival. I will review again after my trip and hope to be able to give a raving 5 star review at that time!

Review.Titre: Inaccurate pickup location claim
Review.Contenu: Wisecars claimed my rental pickup would be at the airport. But instead, it was a good ten-minute shuttle drive away, plus waiting time for the shuttle. The actual rental service providers, IceRentalCars, was fine. But I was promised on-site at the airport by WiseCars, which was not accurate.

Review.Titre: Website good. Looks like hidden cost.
Review.Contenu: Great experience in the website for booking. Have booked, now an email says when I collect car I will.have to pay a deposit but doesn't tell me how much. This was not made known on the website at any point of the booking. (paid more for excess guarantee).

Review.Titre: I was able to find the best price with…
Review.Contenu: I was able to find the best price with wisecars and after I booked it I am a little nervous about the email I received about the voucher and that it might take up to 72 hours to process.  I would of liked to know about the "few things before" email maybe before I booked.  I am at the mercy of the airline and they say that I must contact wisecar if running late.  I was under the impression that when I booked that I was getting a discount rate from one of the providers at the airport, not a voucher that I must show and don't be late.  I am hoping that wisecar comes through for me or I will out of luck in Nashville.

Review.Titre: Wisecar good, subsidiary dodgy.
Review.Contenu: Booked a car in Croatia through Wisecars. I booked full excess insurance for peace of mind, and was given everything I needed. Was told the car would be picked up from Avant Car at Dubrovnik airport.As soon as I turned up at Avant Car “extras” were being thrown at me. The first was a full insurance package, apparently the insurance I had didn’t cover everything. Then came a Bosnian border crossing fee (which I had read you don’t need), then a Croatian island hopping fee? They insisted I had to have one! Felt like I was being scammed and very uncomfortable.

Review.Titre: I was shocked to get a bill for $59 for…
Review.Contenu: I was shocked to get a bill for $59 for using the iPass. We used it for tolls that were less than $7-$8. We were not told or asked about the iPass so we figured we’d get billed for the tolls that we went through.

Review.Titre: It was a car. That drove.
Review.Contenu: It was a car. Was not excited to see there was a delta in price between booking site and at the counter (additional fees and taxes that could have been accounted for at the time of booking).  Also, the site did not communicate the operating rules of the company...I was made aware in line after observing other customers who had been put in rough places w their travel...some place will cancel your reservation if you are delayed by about an hour or charge more for early returns.I’d only trust this if I didn’t foresee any travel delays and had spare cash to hand over.

Review.Titre: Fingers crossed
Review.Contenu: I booked a car through Wisecars for Lihue, HI. The rate I got was about half of everyone else's rates, which makes me a little uneasy. Hopefully there is a car for me and I don't get charged extra...

Review.Titre: Carhire in La Palma with Orlando.
Review.Contenu: Carhire in La Palma with Orlando.Everything was fine excellent car great price all good.On returning home realised we had been debited 20 Euros not sure why ?After three weeks we were told it was a mistake and a credit was arranged.Thanks Anthony

Review.Titre: everything was good but the car was…
Review.Contenu: everything was good but the car was filthy. im not saying a little dirty   it was filthy   the windows were so bad i had to clean them myself, im talking about the inside of the windshield. the rear inside was ann is filty. im not going to hurt my neck to clean it.

Review.Titre: It took two weeks to get a refund!!!!!
Wisecars had the best price for a…
Review.Contenu: Wisecars had the best price for a vehicle but I was charged $57 more than the quoted price AFTER transaction was completed. Full disclosure of the cost is needed BEFORE transaction is done. Don’t want to pay the extra fee!!

Review.Titre: The web site advertised the hire as…
Review.Contenu: The web site advertised the hire as including CDW and cancellation, but both were offered as extra cost options during the order process. Things could be made much clearer with a little more thought.Can't comment on actual vehicle hire until we pick it up.

Review.Titre: Unclear how the £20 coverage/ waiver …
Review.Contenu: Unclear how the £20 coverage/ waiver  worked until we talked with the Europcar agent when we collected the car (I.e. it allows us to make a claim and be reimbursed? Maybe? Still unsure. Rather than actually reducing the excess)

Review.Titre: Good prices but....
Review.Contenu: Good prices, many choices, easy to use.But the final voucher is not clear at all, I have rented a car with some extras at an estimated price but the voucher reflected a total price that is very confusing and I will need to discuss with rental company.

Review.Titre: Great pricing and easy to use search but needs updating
Review.Contenu: Great pricing and easy to use search features. Confirmation emails could use a little jazzing up. Very 1998 looking. Also, could have been made clearer that I was actually rental from Global Car Rental and not Wisecars. Wisecars is a third party search.

Review.Titre: decent experience
Review.Contenu: decent experience.  However they failed to note there was an additional charge posted at the end.  I assume this is an administration fee but this ended up being an extra $26.00 on top of what the quoted rate appeared to be through the whole process.

Review.Titre: They had the car we wanted but we stood…
Review.Contenu: They had the car we wanted but we stood in the line at Fox cars for an hour and 15 minutes  and the car is dirty and smells slightly of mildew. I’m hoping to trade it in somehow as we are driving from San Francisco to San Diego and have it for a week.

Review.Titre: Voucher and reservation number of car provider are not being provided immediately. Very inconvenient.
Review.Contenu: I booked a car, but a couple of days later I realized that -unlike any other online car rental intermediate- wisecars would only email me the voucher 48h before the begin of the rental. That is tricky, because wisecars could legally cancel the reservations at that time and I would be left in the rain, struggling to find a car last minute in the peak season, let alone find a good price. So I asked them for the voucher and within minutes (!) I received it, as well as the reservation number of the actual car provider. Still 3 stars because why did I have to go through this process at all? I will now have to contact the car provider to make sure the reservation number is legit. How is that consumer-friendly? Just make it an automatic step, like everyone else.

Review.Titre: Really slow check in
Review.Contenu: Really slow check in. I believe the person needs to have better keyboard skills. It took forever for him to do the couple in front of me then when it was my turn, I could see why. He had to hunt around the keyboard for everything. Seriously slow.

Review.Titre: Good prices and helpful staff
Review.Contenu: Good prices and helpful staff. The reason I'm not giving a 5 star review is that I booked a vehicle for pickup at 12am on 10/27/21 and the date and time changed to 12pm at 10/26/21 after I submitted it. I sent an email to support, as per the instructions, and received an email back from Hannah saying that I would have to pay an additional $258 to change my booking due to the time of pickup even though I'd have it for less time. I think Wisecars does care about service and tries working with customers, but this isn't a reasonable solution. I am now waiting to see if I can change the pickup for 12pm on 10/27/21 without losing the rental or increasing the cost. I will cancel the rental and go with another company if I can't.

Review.Titre: The reservation process was easy to do
Review.Contenu: The reservation process was easy to do. I look forward to provide more feedback once I’m able to pick up the car. This will be the first time using this service and look forward to a great experience. 🤗

Review.Titre: My experience with Wisecars was a…
Review.Contenu: My experience with Wisecars was a satisfactory one, and we rented a nice, top spec small car from National, and it was a nice, easy transaction from both Wisecars and National. My only problem was upon returning it. There was a scratch and scuff on the wing mirror that had not been picked up on before, and they tried to blame me for it. It was only after arguing for 10 minutes with the guy that he backed down and decided not to charge me for something I hadn't done. It has put me off dealing with National again, but I know Wisecars are just a broker and the whole process with them has been fine so would use them again in the future.

Review.Titre: Reserving the car went OK
Review.Contenu: I was able to get a reservation with out difficulty.  Was unsure of how the shuttle worked until I made ther reservation.  Price seems great.  I don't pick up the car for several months so will rate it again once I have used the car.

Review.Titre: software glitch after making reservation
Review.Contenu: Its March & I reserved a vehicle for May on Maui.  Soon after making the reservation I get an email from Wisecars confirming the rental but telling me to prepare getting my car "in a few days".  ???  I return to the Wisecars website to review my reservation and there is a "countdown for pickup" and the clock is counting down five days until my pickup ??? The rez info is accurate for May pickup; this is confusing and causing distress.  I am now back & forth emailing Wisecars customer service trying to figure out the issue [if there really is one?].  Unnecessary stress for what is usually a very simple online rental transaction. First time using Wisecars, hoping nothing else goes sideways.

Review.Titre: Pretty average
Review.Contenu: Pretty average. The moment we showed up to pick up our car (which was quite difficult due to reduced transport links to the car pick up location, something we didn't know because Wisecar didn't tell us and which the rental provider couldn't tell us either because only Wisecar has our data) we were told that our deposit was going to be GBP2,500. The price of a used car! That's because the insurance we bought through Wisecar wasn't "comprehensive enough". So we had a choice of either buying another insurance -from the rental provider-, pay a GBP2,500 deposit, or forfeit our rental (after the whole ordeal just to get there). Overall, not a good experience.

Review.Titre: Easy Booking - Smelly Car
Review.Contenu: Booking the car was no problem. Easy.  Didn't like the $200 'deposit' required to rent from EZ, so will not be renting from EZ again.  I have not had to do this with any other car rental agency.  Also, the car I was assigned REEKED of cigarette smoke, and made for a decidedly unpleasant car travel experience.
