It should not have been rented out - especially since it appeared to be a non-smoking car given the sticker on the car window that stated there would be a $250 cleaning fee for smoking in the car.  Aside from the cigarette smoke issue, the car itself was great and a pleasure to drive.  Customer service was informative and friendly.

Review.Titre: Can’t complain about the price BUT😪
Review.Contenu: Can’t complain about the price, but if I had wanted a minivan I would have booked one. I don’t think an SUV and a minivan are what I would consider similar, therefore wasn’t thrilled with the choice that was given to our booking!

Review.Titre: OK experience with Wisecars but their supplier (ClickRent.es) was awful
Review.Contenu: Got to Wisecars via Kayak.com. They are a middle man, and it was easy to book a car in Majorca. They used ClickRent as a supplier. After the rental, they sent me a request to review ClickRent, saying:"To ensure our customers receive great service we constantly monitor our partner's performance and quality."But obviously they don't since the reviews of ClickRent.es on the Trustpilot site they sent me to were 80% bad (1 star, the lowest possible rating) and lots of customers complained about getting ripped off. While I have no beef with Wisecars, I think they should live up to what they said above and reconsider whether to work with companies like ClickRent.

Review.Titre: Easy to reserve. Hard to cancel.
Review.Contenu: Easy to book and voucher details are great. However I can find no way on line to delete a reservation. Call center is closed at 2pm EST. With message informing all reservation changes and cancellations can be done online.

Review.Titre: Booking a car is easy and quick but I…
Review.Contenu: Booking a car is easy and quick but I received a bait and switch.I booked based on a location on their map near where I was staying and upon looking it up, it was actually at a different location 30 minutes away!

Review.Titre: Lack of confirmation details
Review.Contenu: The confirmation email was lacking in detail, including confirmation of pickup time and location. I would appreciate these details being included in the confirmation email upon booking.

Review.Titre: Could have been better...,,,,,
Review.Contenu: I was happy to find the best price with Wisecars however when my airline changed the arrival time of my flight (2 hours ahead of original time) I was told the only thing I could switch to was a much smaller car at $100 more! So I had to cancel the car and was charged $47! Just out of curiosity I looked on my Wisecars app and THERE WAS a comparable vehicle within $20 of what I had originally reserved ! I called back to Wisecars and the customer rep told me he was sorry that he didn’t see those vehicles when I called the first time. I asked if he could give me my $47 cancellation fee back and book it for one of these comparable cars. He told me no there was nothing he could do. What started out as a very good experience turned into costing me $47. And another car rental!

Review.Titre: Goldcar Hidden Fees
Review.Contenu: The rate Wisecars found was good,but unfortunately Goldcar company says I have to pay for airport pickup tax of 10.5 percent.Not happy about that as I was convinced that the rate provided was all-inclusive !

Review.Titre: Website is a bit confusing working with…
Review.Contenu: Website is a bit confusing working with 2 windows.  One that scrolls and one that does not.   I had to search to get definitions on some products.  But equal to other sites in completing the reservation.

Review.Titre: Overcharged -- CORRECTED
Review.Contenu: Payment page showed $81.90 amount due, entered credit card, then was charged $205.65 !?!?!??!FOLLOW-UP:  The company acknowledged the issue as a software problem and did promptly refund the difference.

Review.Titre: Very easy for booking online
Review.Contenu: Very easy for booking online, competitive price, plus insurance affordable.

Review.Titre: I wanted a refund as I booked a car…
Review.Contenu: I wanted a refund as I booked a car then changed to a different airport. I sent an email and Dominik emailed me within 10 hours and that a refund would be with me within 13 days maximum.  I recieved my money in my account in 10 days so very happy.

Review.Titre: A Great Beginning
Review.Contenu: The signup process was fairly easy and straight forward with explanations and information on policies understandable. I also called them late at night and got hold of a representative quickly and he stayed on the phone with me for half an hour answering patiently my questions about the company and its operations. All in all it was a great experience and I feel I got a very good deal. Hopefully everything will work out smoothly from here on until I pick up my car rental in Hawaii.

Review.Titre: Finally!
Review.Contenu: I've tried for a long time to get lower rates; your rates for FOX are better than going directly to them AND I can cancel up to 48hours before, which FOX does not offer at low rates on their website.  This is very important for older people AND in the winter AND with what's happening in airlines these days.  So, I hope the rest of this is as good as this has been so far.   Thank you

Review.Titre: Good experience with wisecars…
Review.Contenu: I looked for in Google browser a rentcar next Pisa Airport, I opened skyscanner and  i found wisecars, very easy complete the rental. Price really competitive. I suggest this one.

Review.Titre: I wanted to change my rental time to…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to change my rental time to add 5 days to already booked contract. Because I got to my email request after 3 days no response I called service desk in UK.Here I spoke with Dominik B. He helped me immediately and changed time for rental time and gave me additional informations to supplier and conditions. Thanks for help, now I look forward to our trip:

Review.Titre: Don't let me down
Review.Contenu: Having trouble confirming that you are a real company and not a scam. I was put on terminal hold - that is a sign of a con, could not talk to a real person, (sign of a con).  Honestly If the mix up had not occurred and vehicle reservation were made with flight reservation, I don't think I would have taken the chance with Wisecars and we both would have lost money..

Review.Titre: Affordable and Convenient
Review.Contenu: I've used Wise Cars 3 times now and have appreciated the affordability, the condition of the rental cars, and the ease of getting the cars from the airport locations. My one setback was when our truck broke down in Tahoe, and we needed a 4X4 to get over the snowy pass. We were told (after calling an agent) that we would receive a 4X4, and when we finally got to Reno airport, they said they didn't have a 4x4 available. That was frustrating, mainly due to timing/safety reasons. Otherwise, Wisecars has been a great service. I'm using them again on my summer vacation in Maine; hopefully they will not disappoint.

Review.Titre: Good customer service, but no idea about the car yet

Review.Titre: I ordered a car via Wisecars in Florida…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a car via Wisecars in Florida in June 2022. The price was low in relation to other rental cars. Picking up the car in Orlando they told me, that there was a mistake made by wisecars with the car insurance, because it was only for residents and I was German. I had some trouble to fix it and it took me a week and another drive to the rental station, but finally it was fixed. Wisecars was very gentle handling  the problem and after coming home they gave me the money for my insurance problem back. Good job finally. I can recommend wisecars!!!Stefan Kronenberg, GER

Review.Titre: Wisecars was great, third party had some (technical) issues
Review.Contenu: The booking through Wisecars was easy.When I needed to confirm my booking with the third party, I ran into issues on the third party's website. I couldn't confirm my telephonenummer ( I did not receive the SMS) and  the website itself was very buggy. I contacted the customer support by phone and it got clear for me the third party had an App, I wasn't aware of that. After downloading the App on the phone the whole verification went very smoothly. The support on the phone was very friendly.One feedback though, maybe inform with the booking that you need to download an App for certain third parties? That would help a lot!  :)

Review.Titre: I was on the site and rented a car two…
Review.Contenu: I was on the site and rented a car two weeks before my scheduled vacation. I checked back a week later and the price of the car I rented went down by $75 dollars. Called Wisecars and informed them of the price change. I was told to screenshot the new price and send it Wisecars support. Within a few minutes they sent me a confirmation that they received my email. A short time after that I received another email that they refunded me the difference of the cars. Top notch service and I will continue to use this site in the future.

This is disadvantageous because you might be directed to a rental with a poor rating for service and reliability , maybe a rental company that you would not have done business with otherwise. In such a case you can sometimes cancel (48 hour in advance) without penalty but you will than have to find another rental. You will pay much more because last minute rates are higher.

Review.Contenu: We were totally confused about the exact meaning of certain terms and conditions. As well as why the pick up and drop off times we entered were over written. Lots and lots of questions in rapid fire. Anxiety and a relay between my husband and me. The operator was infinitely patient, checked what he did not know, explained more than once and was courteous and polite. Well done and thank you.

If all goes well, I could easily upgrade this to a 5 star review.

Review.Titre: I don't normally write reviews but…
Review.Contenu: I don't normally write reviews but considering the number of critical reviews I have seen and the outstanding service I received from my WiseCars experience, I feel obligated to share.This is a smaller company so I feel expectations should be measured. If you normally have issues with rental car companies because of age, debit card or some other issue then you are probably better off going to one of the bigger sites like expedia.  However, if you are cost conscious and are in one of the more challenging rental car markets (like New York) then I highly endorse this company. I had a technical issue with my rental and I was able to get someone on the phone to resolve it. The customer service rep at WiseCars even requested that I stay on the line with them as I went to the rental desk to make sure everything would go smoothly. It did go smooth and I didn't need their help but don't expect companies like Expedia to go the extra mile for you like this company did.

Review.Contenu: Kayak ad said rental through Alamo; which I chose because of good reputation for rental experience. Price was as stated, but rental agency was switched. Rental agency not appear on screen after purchase:Payment detailsPrice for 4 day(s)    Car price    $199.86    Taxes and fees    $89.45Amount due at pick-up:$89.45Amount due now:$199.86Total for 4 day(s):$289.31Your booking includes:    Time and Mileage    Full to Full fuel policy     Free Cancellation up to 48h Turns out rented through Thrifty. I would not rent using Wisecars ever again.

Review.Titre: Dear Miguel,
Review.Contenu: Dear Miguel,Thank you for waiting.We're sorry to hear about your experience. I've arranged a refund for your order, which should return to your account within 3-5 business days.I've checked the issue from our end and it looks like the partner hasn't followed our guidelines. We have processes in place to review this type of feedback with the supplier, so your concern hasn't gone unnoticed.Thanks for letting us know. We hope you decide to give Wisecars another try.

I ended up choosing Wisecars for 3 reason. First, the website was incredibly easy to use. Second, they had a vehicle that met my qualifications at the airport terminal where I am going. Review.Titre: Fairly Easy Booking Experience
Review.Contenu: Navigating through the booking process seemed reasonably easy, considering that I am not a 'techie' and normally have difficulty navigating through various websites. Car rental rates are ridiculously high - at least triple - compared to what they were 4,5,6 years ago, but the Wisecars rate was at least 5% to 10% less than most of the competing companies. Providing the option of picking up & returning the vehicle at either the airport rental location or via shuttle service was also important, as the latter option would likely not allow me the necessary time to catch my outgoing flight.
